sentences.chinese: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.english: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.
sentences.chinese: 当地的公司已经同意捐助了。

detailed_translations.english: To contribute money or resources to something means to give money or resources to help pay for something or to help achieve a particular purpose

sentences.english: All the money has been raised by voluntary contribution.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些钱都是靠自愿捐献筹集的。

detailed_translations.english: something that you give or do in order to help something be successful

name: attribute
trans: v. 归因于；n. 属性，特质

sentences.english: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

detailed_translations.english: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation
a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful

name: triumph
trans: n. 胜利，成功；v. 获胜

sentences.english: All her life, Kelly had stuck with difficult tasks and challenges, and triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 凯利在一生中遭遇了种种艰巨任务与挑战，但成功了。

an important victory or success after a difficult struggle

name: typical
trans: adj. 典型的，有代表性的

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

sentences.english: Are you planning to join the union?
sentences.chinese: 你打算加入工会吗？

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["union members"]}
sentences.chinese: 工会会员

detailed_translations.english: an organization formed by workers to protect their rights

sentences.english: Each person’s fingerprints are unique.
sentences.chinese: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

detailed_translations.english: being the only one of its kind

sentences.english: unemployment in urban areas
sentences.chinese: 城市地区的失业状况

sentences.english: the deprived sections of the urban population
sentences.chinese: 城市人口中的贫困群体

detailed_translations.english: relating to towns and cities

sentences.english: He was in urgent need of medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 他急需治疗。

sentences.english: The report called for urgent action to reduce lead in petrol.
sentences.chinese: 报告呼吁迅速采取行动，减少汽油中的铅含量。

sentences.english: an urgent message
sentences.chinese: 一封急报

detailed_translations.english: very important and needing to be dealt with immediately

name: urge
trans: v. 敦促，推动；n. 强烈的欲望

sentences.english: The charity urged quick action.
sentences.chinese: 慈善机构敦促迅速采取行动。

sentences.english: I got a note from Moira urging me to get in touch.
sentences.chinese: 我收到莫伊拉的一封短信，一定要我保持联系。

detailed_translations.english: to strongly suggest that someone does something

sentences.english: an unusual feature
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的特点

sentences.english: unusual circumstances
sentences.chinese: 异常状况

sentences.english: It’s unusual for Dave to be late.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫迟到是很少见的。

sentences.english: (= it is quite common ) to feel very angry in a situation like this.
sentences.chinese: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不平常的， 少有的； 独特的， 与众不同的
detailed_translations.english: different from what is usual or normal

sentences.english: a valid credit card
sentences.chinese: 有效信用卡

sentences.english: Your return ticket is valid for three months.
sentences.chinese: 你的往返票有效期为三个月。

sentences.english: Police officers must have a valid reason for stopping motorists.
sentences.chinese: 警察拦下驾车者必须有正当理由。

detailed_translations.english: that is legally or officially acceptable

name: equivalent
trans: adj. 相等的，等值的；n. 等价物

sentences.english: I had no dollars, but offered him an equivalent amount of sterling.
sentences.chinese: 我没有美金，但给了他等值的英镑。

detailed_translations.english: having the same value, purpose, job etc as a person or thing of a different kind
something that has the same value, purpose, job etc as something else

sentences.english: Tickets are available from the box office.
sentences.chinese: 售票处有票出售。

sentences.english: Meetings were held to update employees as soon as new information became available .
sentences.chinese: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.english: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.chinese: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.english: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.chinese: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可利用的，现有的；可获得的
detailed_translations.english: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found

sentences.english: My keys were here a minute ago but now they’ve vanished.
sentences.chinese: 我的钥匙刚刚还在这里，现在却不翼而飞了。

sentences.english: The bird vanished from sight.
sentences.chinese: 那只鸟从视线中消失了。

sentences.english: She seemed to have just vanished into thin air (= suddenly disappeared in a very mysterious way ).
sentences.chinese: 她好像就蒸发了似的。

detailed_translations.english: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained

sentences.english: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢这家商店商品的丰富多样。

sentences.english: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
sentences.chinese: 那个湖里有二十多种鱼。

sentences.english: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.chinese: 兰花的稀有品种

detailed_translations.english: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting

name: various
trans: adj. 各种各样的，不同的

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

name: variable
trans: adj. 可变的，易变的；n. 变量

sentences.chinese: 预计明天多云有雾，天气多变。

sentences.english: Interest rates can be highly variable.
sentences.chinese: 利率有时会大幅波动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
detailed_translations.english: likely to change often

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
detailed_translations.english: something that may be different in different situations, so that you cannot be sure what will happen

sentences.english: He may be prosecuted for revealing secrets about the security agency.
sentences.chinese: 他可能因泄露安全部门的机密而被起诉。

sentences.english: a test that can reveal a teacher’s hidden skills
sentences.chinese: 能够展现老师潜在技能的测试

detailed_translations.english: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown

sentences.english: advertising revenue
sentences.chinese: 广告收入

sentences.english: Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
sentences.chinese: 罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services

sentences.english: a teachers’ convention
sentences.chinese: 教师大会

sentences.english: the city’s new convention center
sentences.chinese: 该市新建的会议中心

sentences.english: a convention for science fiction fans
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说迷的集会

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting for people who belong to the same profession or organization or who have the same interests

sentences.english: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.chinese: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.english: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会打电话给你安排一个方便的时间见面。

sentences.english: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres
sentences.chinese: 靠近商店和剧院的餐厅

detailed_translations.english: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems

sentences.english: verbal skills
sentences.chinese: 语言技能

detailed_translations.chinese: 口头的； 用言辞的， 用文字的； 动词的
detailed_translations.english: spoken rather than written

sentences.english: Einstein's equations showed the universe to be expanding.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在扩大。

detailed_translations.english: all space, including all the stars and planets

sentences.english: free universal healthcare
sentences.chinese: 免费的全民保健制度

sentences.english: These stories have universal appeal.
sentences.chinese: 这些故事人人都喜欢。

sentences.english: a topic of universal interest
sentences.chinese: 人们普遍感兴趣的一个话题

sentences.english: a universal truth
sentences.chinese: 普遍的真理

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙的，全世界的；普遍的
detailed_translations.english: involving everyone in the world or in a particular group

sentences.english: Is the coffee break the adult version of recess?
sentences.chinese: 工间喝咖啡是成人的休息方式吗？

detailed_translations.english: a way of explaining or doing something that is typical of a particular group or period of time

sentences.english: a political controversy
sentences.chinese: 政治争议

sentences.english: the controversy surrounding Skinner’s theories
sentences.chinese: 围绕斯金纳的理论的争议

sentences.english: (= began ) over the use of the chemicals on crops.
sentences.chinese: 对庄稼施用化学品的做法引起了争论。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument about something that involves many people and continues for a long time

name: reverse
trans: v. 颠倒，撤销；n. 相反

sentences.english: Reverse the paper in the printer.
sentences.chinese: 把打印机中的纸翻过来。

sentences.english: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
sentences.chinese: 这种错误的态度会得到恰好相反的结果。

detailed_translations.english: if a vehicle or its driver reverses, they go backwards

detailed_translations.chinese: 反向的； 相反的； 颠倒的
detailed_translations.english: Reverse means opposite from what you expect or to what has just been described

detailed_translations.chinese: 撤销，废除；使完全相反，彻底转变；使反转，使次序颠倒
detailed_translations.english: to change something, such as a decision, judgment, or process so that it is the opposite of what it was before

detailed_translations.chinese: 相反情况，对立面；反面，背面，后面；损失，倒退
detailed_translations.english: the exact opposite of what has just been mentioned

sentences.english: I’ve got a few thousand dollars I’m looking to invest.
sentences.chinese: 我有几千美元想作投资。

sentences.english: It was very difficult to leave a home we had invested so much in.
sentences.chinese: 那个家我们投入得太多，要离开真的很难。

detailed_translations.english: to buy shares, property, or goods because you hope that the value will increase and you can make a profit

sentences.english: We plan to buy some property as an investment.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算买些房地产作为投资。

sentences.english: a huge investment of time and effort
sentences.chinese: 时间和精力的大量投入

detailed_translations.english: the use of money to get a profit or to make a business activity successful, or the money that is used

sentences.english: The obvious way of reducing pollution is to use cars less.
sentences.chinese: 减少污染显而易见的办法就是少用汽车。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice or understand

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

sentences.english: We found further scientific evidence for this theory.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。

sentences.english: I was asked to give evidence (= to say what I knew, describe what I had seen, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 我被要求出庭作证。

detailed_translations.english: facts or signs that show clearly that something exists or is true

sentences.english: The agreement includes a provision for each side to check the other side’s weapons.
sentences.chinese: 协议有项规定，允许双方互查武器。

sentences.english: Under the provisions of the Act, employers must supply safety equipment.
sentences.chinese: 该法令规定，雇主必须提供安全设备。

detailed_translations.english: a condition in an agreement or law

sentences.english: Artists translate their ideas into visual images.
sentences.chinese: 画家把自己的思想转换成视觉画面。

detailed_translations.english: relating to seeing

sentences.english: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists

sentences.english: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.english: regimes that violate human rights
sentences.chinese: 侵犯人权的政权

detailed_translations.english: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

sentences.english: Women have often been used as symbols of virtue.
sentences.chinese: 女性常被用作美德的象征。

sentences.english: Wilkins is now extolling the virtues of organic farming.
sentences.chinese: 威尔金斯现在盛赞有机耕作的好处。

detailed_translations.english: moral goodness of character and behaviour

sentences.english: The doctors gave him a one in ten chance of survival .
sentences.chinese: 医生说他有十分之一的生存希望。

sentences.english: The cult is a survival from the old Zoroastrian religion.
sentences.chinese: 这种膜拜仪式是古老的拜火教遗留下来的。

detailed_translations.english: the state of continuing to live or exist

name: vital
trans: adj. 至关重要的，充满活力的

sentences.english: The work she does is absolutely vital.
sentences.chinese: 她所做的工作至关重要。

sentences.english: It is vital to be honest with your children.
sentences.chinese: 对自己的孩子坦诚十分重要。

sentences.english: The tourist industry is of vital importance to the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业对国家的经济至关重要。

sentences.english: Richardson played a vital role in the team’s success.
sentences.chinese: 理查森对球队的成功起了极重要的作用。

sentences.english: The samples could give scientists vital information about long-term changes in the earth’s atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这些样本可以给科学家提供关于地球大气长期变化的极其重要的资料。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary for something to succeed or exist

name: advocate
trans: v. 提倡，主张；n. 倡导者

sentences.english: Extremists were openly advocating violence.
sentences.chinese: 极端主义者公开鼓吹使用暴力。

sentences.english: Mr. Williams is a conservative who advocates fewer government controls on business.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯先生是一位提倡减少政府对商业的控制的保守人士。

detailed_translations.english: If you advocate a particular action or plan, you recommend it publicly
someone who publicly supports someone or something

sentences.english: Workers are being encouraged to take voluntary redundancy.
sentences.chinese: 工人被鼓励主动离职。

detailed_translations.english: done willingly and without being forced

sentences.english: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.english: I volunteered my services as a driver.
sentences.chinese: 我主动提出来当司机。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do

sentences.english: What will the job involve?
sentences.chinese: 这份工作包括什么？

sentences.english: I didn’t realize putting on a play involved so much work.
sentences.chinese: 我没想到上演一出戏剧需要做这么多的工作。

detailed_translations.english: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it

sentences.english: Can you turn the volume up?
sentences.chinese: 请你把音量调大好吗？

sentences.english: The volume of the container measures 10,000 cubic metres.
sentences.chinese: 这个容器的容量是1万立方米。

sentences.english: The period from 1940 – 1945 is in volume 9.
sentences.chinese: 1940年至1945年这段时间在第9卷。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of sound produced by a television, radio etc

sentences.english: the French Revolution of 1789
sentences.chinese: 1789年法国大革命

sentences.english: the planets’ revolution around the sun
sentences.chinese: 行星围绕太阳的公转

detailed_translations.english: an attempt, by a large number of people, to change the government of a country, especially by violent action

sentences.english: He took advantage of me when I was at my most vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 他在我最脆弱的时候利用了我。

sentences.english: We work mainly with the elderly and other vulnerable groups.
sentences.chinese: 我们主要和老年人以及其他弱势群体打交道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 脆弱的, 易受影响的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is vulnerable can be easily harmed or hurt

sentences.english: I don't think people are really aware of just how much it costs.
sentences.chinese: 我认为人们并不真正明白这要花多少钱。

sentences.english: Were you aware that something was wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有意识到已经出了问题？

detailed_translations.english: knowing or realizing sth

sentences.english: The return flight of the aircraft was delayed.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的返回航程被推迟了。

detailed_translations.english: a plane or other vehicle that can fly

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

detailed_translations.english: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane

sentences.english: A car drew up alongside .
sentences.chinese: 一辆车在旁边停了下来。

sentences.english: Children’s prices are shown alongside adult prices.
sentences.chinese: 儿童票价标在成人票价旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to the side of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…旁边， 沿着…的边； 和…在一起

sentences.english: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.chinese: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.english: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.chinese: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.english: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.chinese: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
detailed_translations.english: someone’s family, education, previous work etc

sentences.english: By changing the tomato’s genetic blueprint , scientists can alter the rate at which it ripens.
sentences.chinese: 科学家可以通过改变番茄的基因蓝图来改变它的成熟速度。

detailed_translations.english: a plan for achieving something

sentences.english: deputy/vice chairman Barrett serves as vice chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴雷特担任副主席一职。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a man, who is in charge of a meeting or directs the work of a committee or an organization

sentences.english: customer details held on a database
sentences.chinese: 存储在数据库内的客户详细信息

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of data stored in a computer system so that you can find and use it easily

sentences.english: She is becoming famous in Australia and elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。

sentences.english: Kerala has less crime and alcoholism than elsewhere in India.
sentences.chinese: 喀拉拉邦的犯罪和酗酒现象少于印度的其他地区。

detailed_translations.english: in, at, or to another place

sentences.english: How can I provide feedback without making someone angry?
sentences.chinese: 我怎样才能提出反馈意见又不会得罪人呢？

detailed_translations.english: advice, criticism etc about how successful or useful something is

sentences.english: He is old and unpopular. Furthermore, he has at best only two years of political life ahead of him.
sentences.chinese: 他年纪已老，又不得人心，而且他最多也只有两年的政治生命了。

detailed_translations.english: in addition to what has already been said

name: highlight
trans: v. 强调，突出；n. 亮点

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.english: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.chinese: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

sentences.english: household chores
sentences.chinese: 家务杂活

sentences.english: ...growing up in a male-only household.
sentences.chinese: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭的， 家喻户晓的
detailed_translations.english: relating to looking after a house and the people in it
A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house

sentences.english: Cook the sauce over a medium heat until it thickens. Meanwhile start boiling the water for the pasta.
sentences.chinese: 用中火把调味汁煮到变稠，同时烧水准备煮意大利面。

detailed_translations.english: while something else is happening

sentences.english: The rent is reasonable and, moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.english: The source of the information is irrelevant. Moreover, the information need not be confidential.
sentences.chinese: 信息来源无关紧要，而且也不一定必须是机密的。

detailed_translations.english: in addition – used to introduce information that adds to or supports what has previously been said

sentences.english: She had read about it in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 关于这件事她已经在报纸上看到了。

sentences.english: a series of newspaper articles about life in Cuba
sentences.chinese: 刊登在报纸上的一系列关于古巴生活的文章

detailed_translations.english: a set of large folded sheets of printed paper containing news, articles, pictures, advertisements etc which is sold daily or weekly

sentences.english: People who had heard the evidence at the trial were surprised at the outcome.
sentences.chinese: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens

name: outline
trans: n. 大纲，轮廓；v. 概述

sentences.english: a research proposal outline
sentences.chinese: 研究计划梗概

detailed_translations.english: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details
to describe something in a general way, giving the main points but not the details

name: output
trans: n. 输出，产量；v. 输出

sentences.english: Output is up 30% on last year.
sentences.chinese: 产量比去年提高了30%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc
if a computer outputs information, it produces it

name: overall
trans: adj. 全面的，总体的；adv. 总的来说

sentences.english: The overall cost of the exhibition was £400,000.
sentences.chinese: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.english: The overall result is an increase in population.
sentences.chinese: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.english: An overall winner and a runner-up were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.english: We don’t want all the details now, just the overall picture.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们不需要全部细节，只要知道大致的情况。

detailed_translations.english: heavy cotton trousers with a piece covering your chest, held up by pieces of cloth that go over your shoulders
considering or including everything

sentences.english: Our room overlooks the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房间可以俯视大海。

sentences.english: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.chinese: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.english: She found him entertaining enough to overlook his faults.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得他很有趣，足以让她包容他的缺点。

detailed_translations.english: if a house, room etc overlooks something, it has a view of it, usually from above

sentences.english: The price of home ownership is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 房价在不断上涨。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of owning something

sentences.english: The so-called experts couldn’t tell us what was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 那些所谓的专家说不出问题出在哪里。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe someone or something that has been given a name that you think is wrong

sentences.english: She loaded the new software .
sentences.chinese: 她给电脑装上新的软件。

sentences.english: a software company
sentences.chinese: 软件公司

detailed_translations.english: the sets of programs that tell a computer how to do a particular job

sentences.english: Things have changed somewhat since then.
sentences.chinese: 从那时候起，情况就有些不一样了。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little but not very

sentences.english: a large organization with offices throughout the world
sentences.chinese: 在世界各地都设有办事处的一家大型机构

sentences.english: The disease spread rapidly throughout Europe.
sentences.chinese: 疾病迅速在整个欧洲蔓延开来。

sentences.english: The house is in excellent condition, with fitted carpets throughout.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子状况极好，全部铺着地毯。

sentences.english: We are open every weekend throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 我们全年每个周末都对外开放。

detailed_translations.english: in every part of a particular area, place etc
during all of a particular period, from the beginning to the end

sentences.english: We underestimated how long it would take to get there.
sentences.chinese: 我们低估了到那里所需的时间。

sentences.english: Never underestimate the power of the press.
sentences.chinese: 绝不要低估新闻界的力量。

detailed_translations.english: to think or guess that something is smaller, cheaper, easier etc than it really is

sentences.english: second-year undergraduates
sentences.chinese: 大学二年级学生

detailed_translations.english: a student at college or university, who is working for their first degree

sentences.english: This tragic incident underlines the need for immediate action.
sentences.chinese: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

detailed_translations.english: to draw a line under a word to show that it is important

sentences.english: economic policies that threaten to undermine the health care system
sentences.chinese: 可能会损害医疗保健制度的经济政策

detailed_translations.english: to gradually make someone or something less strong or effective

sentences.english: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

detailed_translations.chinese: 心烦的， 苦恼的； 不适的
detailed_translations.english: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
an illness that affects the stomach and makes you feel sick

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

sentences.english: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.chinese: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩回， 退出； 撤退
detailed_translations.english: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

sentences.english: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
sentences.chinese: 他想做有意义的工作。

sentences.english: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

detailed_translations.english: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it

sentences.english: the ability to walk
sentences.chinese: 行走的能力

sentences.english: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to do something

sentences.english: I’ve never lived abroad before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从未在国外生活过。

sentences.english: She often goes abroad on business.
sentences.chinese: 她经常出国公干。

sentences.english: We never travelled abroad when we were kids.
sentences.chinese: 我们小时候从来没有去国外旅行过。

sentences.english: goods imported from abroad
sentences.chinese: 从国外进口的商品

sentences.english: The books about Harry Potter have been very popular, both at home and abroad .
sentences.chinese: 有关哈利·波特的书在国内外一直都很流行。

detailed_translations.english: in or to a foreign country

sentences.english: In the absence of any evidence, the police had to let Myers go.
sentences.chinese: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在
detailed_translations.english: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

name: abuse
trans: n. 滥用，虐待；v. 滥用，虐待

sentences.english: several cases of child abuse
sentences.chinese: 数宗虐待儿童案

sentences.english: An independent committee will look into alleged human rights abuses.
sentences.chinese: 一个独立委员会将对涉嫌践踏人权的行为进行调查。

detailed_translations.english: cruel or violent treatment of someone
to deliberately use something for the wrong purpose or for your own advantage

sentences.english: He possessed no academic qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 他没有学历。

sentences.english: a program to raise academic standards
sentences.chinese: 旨在提高学术水平的计划

detailed_translations.english: relating to education, especially at college or university level

sentences.english: We have accomplished all we set out to do.
sentences.chinese: 所有计划要做的事情，我们都已完成。

sentences.english: Mission accomplished(=  we have done what we intended to do  ) .
sentences.chinese: 大功告成。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in doing something, especially after trying very hard

sentences.english: The family acknowledge the need for change.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都承认需要改变一下。

sentences.english: I would be grateful if you would acknowledge receipt of this letter.
sentences.chinese: 收到此信后请告知，不胜感谢。

detailed_translations.english: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

name: address
trans: n. 地址；v. 解决，致辞

detailed_translations.english: if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

sentences.english: One of the many advantages of living in New York is that you can eat out at almost any time of day.
sentences.chinese: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交部

sentences.english: Women had little role in public affairs.
sentences.chinese: 女性过去几乎不参与公共事务。

sentences.english: the Watergate affair
sentences.chinese: 水门事件

sentences.english: He had an affair with his boss that lasted six years.
sentences.chinese: 他和老板的暧昧关系持续了六年。

detailed_translations.english: public or political events and activities

sentences.english: We can’t afford to wait any longer or we’ll miss the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们再也不能等下去了，否则会赶不上飞机的。

sentences.english: The room affords a beautiful view over the city.
sentences.chinese: 这房间可以俯瞰城市美景。

sentences.english: The new law will afford protection to employees.

sentences.chinese: 琼斯的活动搞得很成功。

sentences.chinese: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.chinese: 座位共有10种票价，现有8种可售。

sentences.chinese: 婚礼

sentences.chinese: 奥运会开幕式

sentences.chinese: 女王按照规定的礼仪加冕。

sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

sentences.chinese: 第四频道播出的新闻

sentences.chinese: 孩子们在看迪士尼频道的卡通片。

sentences.english: What channel is ‘ER’ on?
sentences.chinese: 《仁心仁术》在哪个频道播放？

sentences.english: He changed channels to watch the basketball game.
sentences.chinese: 他转换频道看篮球比赛。

sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

sentences.chinese: 明亮的色彩是他绘画作品的特点。

detailed_translations.english: to describe the qualities of someone or something in a particular way

name: characteristic
trans: n. 特征，特点；adj. 典型的

sentences.english: the highly characteristic (= very typical ) flint walls of the local houses
sentences.chinese: 当地房子非常有特色的燧石墙

sentences.english: Violent images are a defining characteristic of his work.
sentences.chinese: 暴力形象是他作品的一个鲜明特征。

detailed_translations.english: very typical of a particular thing or of someone’s character

name: charge
trans: v. 收费，指控；n. 费用

sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

name: check
trans: v. 检查，核对；n. 支票，检查

sentences.chinese: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.chinese: 揭开谜团的第一条规则是核查事实。

sentences.chinese: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.chinese: 要经常检查水质。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in order to find out whether something really is correct, true, or in good condition

sentences.english: a packet of cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 一包香烟

sentences.chinese: 我们绕着老城走了一圈。

detailed_translations.english: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path

trans: v. 声称，要求；n. 要求，声称

sentences.chinese: 我不会自称是女权主义者，但我希望看到更多的女性担任高职。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved

sentences.english: a colleague of mine from the bank
sentences.chinese: 我在银行的一位同事

sentences.english: She discussed the idea with some of her colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 她和几位同事讨论了这个想法。

detailed_translations.english: someone you work with – used especially by professional people

sentences.english: He writes a weekly column for ‘The Times’.
sentences.chinese: 他每周为《泰晤士报》写一篇专栏文章。

detailed_translations.english: an article on a particular subject or by a particular writer that appears regularly in a newspaper or magazine

name: command
trans: v. 指挥，命令；n. 命令，控制

sentences.english: He commanded his men to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 他命令手下撤退。

sentences.english: He commands the 4th Battalion.
sentences.chinese: 他指挥第四营。

sentences.english: the power and finances commanded by the police
sentences.chinese: 警方掌握的权力和资金

detailed_translations.english: (of sb in a position of authority) to tell sb to do sth

name: competitive
trans: adj. 竞争的，有竞争力的

sentences.english: Competitive sports encourage children to work together as a team.
sentences.chinese: 竞技体育鼓励孩子们进行团队协作。

sentences.english: Advertising is an intensely competitive business.
sentences.chinese: 广告业是一个竞争激烈的行业。

detailed_translations.english: relating to competition

sentences.english: There was a constant stream of visitors to the house.
sentences.chinese: 参观这幢房子的游客川流不息。

sentences.english: Amy lived in constant fear of being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 埃米一直生活在害怕遭到袭击的恐惧之中。

sentences.english: He kept in constant contact with his family while he was in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚时一直和家人保持着联系。

sentences.english: travelling at a constant speed
sentences.chinese: 以恒定速度行驶

detailed_translations.english: happening regularly or all the time

sentences.english: The meaning of ‘mad’ depends on its context.
sentences.chinese: mad一词的意义要视上下文而定。

sentences.english: the political context of the election
sentences.chinese: 此次选举的政治背景

detailed_translations.english: the words that come just before and after a word or sentence and that help you understand its meaning

sentences.english: the continents of Asia and Africa
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及非洲大陆

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of land surrounded by sea
able to control your sexual desires

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

sentences.english: Sometimes I find it hard to cope.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我觉得很难应付。

sentences.english: He coped quite well as manager while still captaining the team.
sentences.chinese: 他是球队的主教练，同时兼任队长，干得相当好。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in dealing with a difficult problem or situation

sentences.english: The company is moving its corporate headquarters (= main offices ) from New York to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司要把总部从纽约迁到休斯敦。

sentences.english: Vince is vice-president of corporate communications.
sentences.chinese: 文斯是负责企业宣传的副总裁。

sentences.english: Corporate America is not about to be converted to the environmentalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 美国企业界不打算投身环保事业。

sentences.english: changing the corporate culture (= the way that people in a corporation think and behave ) to accept family-friendly policies
sentences.chinese: 改变公司文化，采取更关怀家庭的政策

sentences.english: an advertising campaign intended to reinforce our corporate identity
sentences.chinese: 旨在加强我们公司形象的广告宣传活动

sentences.english: The yacht can be hired for corporate hospitality (= entertainment provided by companies for their customers ) .
sentences.chinese: 可以租下这艘游艇用于公司招待客户。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法人团体的， 公司的； 全体的， 共同的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to a corporation

name: court
trans: n. 法院，球场；v. 招致

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.english: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.english: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.english: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.english: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.chinese: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the jury who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

name: craft
trans: n. 工艺，手艺；v. 精心制作

sentences.english: traditional rural crafts
sentences.chinese: 传统的乡村手工艺

sentences.english: arts and crafts
sentences.chinese: 手工艺

detailed_translations.english: a job or activity in which you make things with your hands, and that you usually need skill to do
to make something using a special skill, especially with your hands

name: credit
trans: n. 信用，信誉；v. 归功于，赞扬

sentences.english: We found his statement hard to credit.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.english: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.chinese: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true
the belief that something is true or correct

name: crop
trans: n. 庄稼，收成；v. 收割

sentences.english: The main crops were oats and barley.
sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

sentences.english: crops grown for market
sentences.chinese: 为供应市场而种植的作物

sentences.english: Fruit growers are gathering in a bumper crop (= a very large amount of something produced in season ) .
sentences.chinese: 果农正在采摘丰收的果实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农作物，庄稼；一熟：一季的收成
detailed_translations.english: a plant such as wheat, rice, or fruit that is grown by farmers and used as food

name: curb
trans: v. 抑制，限制；n. 路缘，限制

sentences.english: measures to curb the spread of the virus
sentences.chinese: 控制病毒扩散的措施

detailed_translations.english: to control or limit something in order to prevent it from having a harmful effect

detailed_translations.chinese: 控制， 约束； 路缘
detailed_translations.english: an influence which helps to control or limit something

sentences.english: Danger! No boats beyond this point.
sentences.chinese: 危险！船只不可越过此处。

sentences.english: The refugees believe that their lives are in danger .
sentences.chinese: 难民认为他们有生命危险。

detailed_translations.english: the possibility that someone or something will be harmed, destroyed, or killed

sentences.english: laws about dangerous dogs
sentences.chinese: 有关危险犬类的法律

sentences.english: Some of these prisoners are extremely dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.english: The powdered milk was not as good as breast milk, and was downright dangerous (= actually dangerous ) when it was mixed with unclean water.
sentences.chinese: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

detailed_translations.english: able or likely to harm or kill you

sentences.english: The church was dark and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里黑魆魆的，寂静无声。

sentences.english: the dark winter days
sentences.chinese: 阴暗的冬日

sentences.english: Suddenly, the room went dark (= became dark ) .
sentences.chinese: 房间突然变暗了。

sentences.english: (= night begins ) about ten o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 大约十点钟开始天黑。

sentences.english: It was still dark (= was night ) when we boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 我们上火车时天还是黑的。

sentences.english: It was pitch dark (= completely dark ) in the attic.
sentences.chinese: 阁楼上漆黑一片。

detailed_translations.english: if it is dark, there is little or no light

name: deal
trans: v. 处理，分配；n. 协议，交易

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

sentences.english: Do you ever wonder if you made the right decision?
sentences.chinese: 你怀疑过自己所作的决定是否正确吗？

sentences.english: The judges’ decision is final (= it will not be changed ).
sentences.chinese: 法官的裁决是最终判决。

sentences.english: the ability to act with speed and decision
sentences.chinese: 处事迅速果断的能力

detailed_translations.english: a choice or judgment that you make after a period of discussion or thought

name: delay
trans: v. 延迟，推迟；n. 延迟

sentences.english: Don’t delay – send off for the information now.
sentences.chinese: 别犹豫——即刻去函索取信息。

sentences.english: He delayed his decision on whether to call an election.
sentences.chinese: 在是否宣布举行选举一事上，他推迟作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to wait until a later time to do something

name: delight
trans: n. 高兴，愉快；v. 使高兴

sentences.english: The kids were screaming with delight.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在高兴地尖叫。

sentences.english: He is delighting audiences with his wit and humour.
sentences.chinese: 他在用自己的智慧和幽默娱乐观众。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great pleasure and satisfaction
to give someone great satisfaction and enjoyment

sentences.english: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.chinese: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.english: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.english: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

sentences.english: Most Indian restaurants offer free delivery.
sentences.chinese: 大多数印度餐馆提供免费外送服务。

sentences.english: You can expect delivery in a week to ten days.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在一周至十天内收到货物。

sentences.english: fresh milk deliveries
sentences.chinese: 新鲜牛奶递送

sentences.english: Mrs Howell had an easy delivery.
sentences.chinese: 豪厄尔太太的分娩很顺利。

detailed_translations.english: the act of bringing goods, letters etc to a particular person or place, or the things that are brought

sentences.english: Jan’s mother was dependent on her for physical care.
sentences.chinese: 简的母亲要靠简来照顾。

sentences.english: Do you have any dependent children (= who you are still supporting financially ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有需要扶养的孩子？

detailed_translations.english: needing someone or something in order to exist, be successful, be healthy etc

name: desirable
trans: adj. 值得拥有的，理想的

sentences.english: The ability to speak a foreign language is highly desirable .
sentences.chinese: 能说一门外语是非常理想的。

sentences.english: a desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 理想的社区

sentences.english: It is desirable that you should have some familiarity with computers.
sentences.chinese: 应该对电脑有所熟悉，这是很有益处的。

sentences.english: It is desirable to keep the cost as low as possible.
sentences.chinese: 把成本控制得越低越好。

detailed_translations.english: something that is desirable is worth having or doing

sentences.english: Despite all our efforts to save the school, the authorities decided to close it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我们竭力想保住这所学校，当局还是决定把它关闭。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something happens or is true even though something else might have prevented it

sentences.english: companies that are polluting and destroying the environment
sentences.chinese: 污染和破坏环境的公司

detailed_translations.english: to damage something so badly that it no longer exists or cannot be used or repaired

sentences.english: digital TV
sentences.chinese: 数字电视

sentences.english: a digital signal
sentences.chinese: 数字信号

sentences.english: a digital camera
sentences.chinese: 数码照相机

sentences.english: digital recording
sentences.chinese: 数字录音

detailed_translations.english: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros

sentences.english: carbon/sulphur dioxide
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳／硫

detailed_translations.english: a chemical compound that contains two atoms of oxygen and one atom of another chemical element

sentences.english: severe eating disorders such as bulimia and anorexia
sentences.chinese: 像贪食症和厌食症这类严重的进食障碍

detailed_translations.chinese: 混乱， 杂乱， 骚乱
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which a lot of people behave in an uncontrolled, noisy, or violent way in public

name: display
trans: v. 展示，显示；n. 展示，显示

sentences.english: a dazzling display (= very good display ) of flowers
sentences.chinese: 令人目眩神迷的花卉展

sentences.english: The window display caught her eye.
sentences.chinese: 橱窗陈列吸引了她的目光。

sentences.english: shop windows displaying the latest fashions
sentences.chinese: 展示最新时装的商店橱窗

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement of things for people to look at or buy
to show something to people, or put it in a place where people can see it easily

name: dispute
trans: n. 争论，纠纷；v. 争论

sentences.english: It is beyond dispute that advances in medicine have enabled people to live longer.
sentences.chinese: 医学的发展使人们更加长寿，这是无可置疑的。

sentences.english: What happened next is hotly disputed .
sentences.chinese: 关于后来发生了什么，争论很激烈。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument or disagreement
to argue or disagree with someone

sentences.english: the sound of distant gunfire
sentences.chinese: 远处的炮火声

sentences.english: Her honeymoon seemed a distant memory.
sentences.chinese: 她的蜜月似乎成了遥远的记忆。

sentences.english: That affair was in the dim and distant past (= a long time ago ) .
sentences.chinese: 那件事已成为遥远的过去了。

sentences.english: The President hopes to visit Ireland in the not too distant future (= quite soon ) .
sentences.chinese: 总统希望在不久的将来访问爱尔兰。

sentences.english: After the quarrel Sue remained cold and distant.
sentences.chinese: 那次争吵之后，休一直冷淡疏远。

detailed_translations.english: far away in space or time

sentences.english: a house in a pleasant suburban district
sentences.chinese: 地处宜人郊区的一幢房屋

detailed_translations.english: an area of a town or the countryside, especially one with particular features

sentences.english: David’s parents divorced when he was six.
sentences.chinese: 戴维的父母在他六岁时离婚了。

sentences.english: My father threatened to divorce her.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲威胁说要和她离婚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离婚； 分离， 脱离
detailed_translations.english: if someone divorces their husband or wife, or if two people divorce, they legally end their marriage
the legal ending of a marriage

sentences.english: a double sink
sentences.chinese: 双水槽

sentences.english: a double wardrobe
sentences.chinese: 双门衣柜

sentences.english: the great double doors of the cathedral
sentences.chinese: 大教堂宏伟的双开大门

sentences.english: Don’t park your car on double yellow lines.
sentences.chinese: 不可以在双黄线处停车。

sentences.english: The city was enclosed by walls of double thickness.
sentences.chinese: 该城被两倍厚的墙围了起来。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of two parts that are similar or exactly the same

sentences.english: There was still one little nagging doubt at the back of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的心头仍有一丝挥之不去的疑虑。

sentences.english: Kim never doubted his story.
sentences.chinese: 例句：金对于他讲的事情从不怀疑。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely

sentences.english: a dozen eggs
sentences.chinese: 一打鸡蛋

sentences.english: Chris, Helen, and half a dozen others went on holiday together.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯、海伦和其他六个人一起去度假了。

sentences.english: (= about 12 ) cars were parked near the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 入口附近停了大约十二辆汽车。

detailed_translations.english: twelve

name: draft
trans: n. 草稿，草案；v. 起草

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

sentences.english: A superb goal by Owen earned United a dramatic victory yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天欧文的一个超级入球为联队赢得了激动人心的胜利。

sentences.english: Some of the most dramatic events in American history happened here.
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上一些最震撼人心的事件发生在这里。

sentences.english: the dramatic scenery of the Grand Canyon
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷的壮丽景致

detailed_translations.chinese: 引人注目的， 激动人心的； 戏剧的
detailed_translations.english: exciting or impressive

sentences.english: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.english: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.english: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.english: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.chinese: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.english: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.english: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

detailed_translations.english: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do

name: ease
trans: v. 缓解，放松；n. 轻松，舒适

sentences.english: She lived a life of ease.
sentences.chinese: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

sentences.english: The plan should ease traffic congestion in the town.
sentences.chinese: 这项计划对城里的交通拥挤状况应该有所缓解。

detailed_translations.english: lack of difficulty
to become or to make sth less unpleasant, painful, severe, etc.

sentences.english: a struggle for power within the ruling elite
sentences.chinese: 统治阶层内部的争权夺利

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have a lot of power and influence because they have money, knowledge, or special skills

sentences.english: We hope these regions will embrace democratic reforms.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望这些地区会乐意接受民主改革。

sentences.english: Most West European countries have embraced the concept of high-speed rail networks with enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 大多数西欧国家都表现出极大的兴趣，欣然接受修建高速铁路网的想法。

detailed_translations.english: to eagerly accept a new idea, opinion, religion etc

sentences.english: The system already exists in embryo.
sentences.chinese: 该体系已具雏形。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or human that has not yet been born, and has just begun to develop

sentences.english: a change of emphasis in government policy
sentences.chinese: 政府政策重心的变化

detailed_translations.chinese: 强调； 重视； 重要性
detailed_translations.english: special attention or importance

sentences.english: an empty box
sentences.chinese: 空盒子

sentences.english: an empty bottle
sentences.chinese: 空瓶子

sentences.english: an empty space behind the desk
sentences.chinese: 书桌后面的空位

sentences.english: The fuel tank’s almost empty.
sentences.chinese: 燃油箱快要空了。

detailed_translations.english: having nothing inside

name: endeavour
trans: v. 努力，尝试；n. 努力

sentences.english: But I will endeavour to banish every painful thought, and think only of what will make me happy: your affection, and the invariable kindness of my dear uncle and aunt.
sentences.chinese: 可是我一定会竭力打消一切苦痛的念头，只去想一些能使我高兴的事───譬如想想你的亲切以及亲爱的舅父母对我始终如一的关切。

detailed_translations.chinese: 竭力做到，试图或力图（做某事）
detailed_translations.english: to try very hard

sentences.english: She engaged the clutch and the car moved.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下离合器，汽车便开动了。

sentences.english: The wheel engages with the cog and turns it.
sentences.chinese: 轮子咬住轮齿并带动它转动。

detailed_translations.english: if you engage part of a machine, or if it engages, it moves so that it fits into another part of the machine

name: engineer
trans: n. 工程师；v. 设计，策划

sentences.english: He trained as a civil engineer (= one who designs and builds roads, bridges etc ).
sentences.chinese: 他接受过土木工程师培训。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design or build roads, bridges, machines etc

sentences.english: Good lighting will enhance any room.
sentences.chinese: 良好的照明能给房间增色不少。

sentences.english: The publicity has enhanced his reputation.
sentences.chinese: 这次宣传提高了他的声誉。

detailed_translations.english: to improve something

sentences.english: state/public enterprise (=one owned by the government)
sentences.chinese: 国有企业/公共事业单位

sentences.english: We’re looking for young people with enterprise and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找有事业心和创造力的年轻人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 事业,企(事)业单位；事业心,进取心
detailed_translations.english: a company, organization, or business

sentences.english: The town provides a wide choice of entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 该镇提供各式各样的娱乐活动。

sentences.english: There will be live entertainment (= performed then, not recorded ) throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 现场表演将持续一整天。

sentences.english: The dolphins give good entertainment value (= a lot of amusement and interest ).
sentences.chinese: 海豚具有很高的娱乐价值。

detailed_translations.chinese: 娱乐， 文娱节目， 表演会； 招待， 款待， 请客
detailed_translations.english: things such as films, television, performances etc that are intended to amuse or interest people

sentences.english: It was the worst day in my entire life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.english: The entire staff agreed.
sentences.chinese: 全体员工都同意了。

sentences.english: Have you drunk the entire bottle?
sentences.chinese: 你把整瓶酒都喝了吗？

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc

sentences.english: “You have to be an optimist to be an inventor or entrepreneur, ” he concludes.
sentences.chinese: 要成为一位发明家或企业家，你必须得是个乐天派。

sentences.english: If any of you end up being entrepreneur, which I hope you will be, what do you have in store for yourself, and what does that journey look like?
sentences.chinese: 如果你们当中任何一个人成了企业家，这也是我希望你们做到的，你自己会有什么样的储备，那样的一段旅程又将是什么样的？

sentences.english: How would you define personal growth as an entrepreneur?
sentences.chinese: 你会如何定义,一个企业家的个人成长？

detailed_translations.english: someone who starts a new business or arranges business deals in order to make money, often in a way that involves financial risks

sentences.english: a shop selling camping equipment
sentences.chinese: 出售露营装备的商店

sentences.english: some brand new computer equipment
sentences.chinese: 一些全新的计算机设备

sentences.english: a very useful piece of equipment
sentences.chinese: 一件非常有用的设备

sentences.english: A lot of money was spent on the equipment of the new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 新医院的装备花费巨大。

detailed_translations.english: the tools, machines etc that you need to do a particular job or activity

sentences.english: The school has evolved its own style of teaching.
sentences.chinese: 学校逐步形成了自己的教学风格。

sentences.english: Businesses need to evolve rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 各项业务需要快速发展。

detailed_translations.english: to develop and change gradually over a long period of time

sentences.english: the theory of evolution
sentences.chinese: 进化论

detailed_translations.english: the scientific idea that plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time

sentences.english: A team of divers was sent down to examine the wreck.
sentences.chinese: 一组潜水员被送到水下检查沉船。

sentences.english: Hegel’s philosophy will be examined in detail in Chapter 4.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔的哲学将在第4章作详细探讨。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something carefully and thoroughly because you want to find out more about it

sentences.english: The examination results will be announced in September.
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩将于9月公布。

sentences.english: He’s already taken the entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 他已经参加了入学考试。

sentences.english: The proposals are still under examination.
sentences.chinese: 那些提案还在审查之中。

detailed_translations.english: a spoken or written test of knowledge, especially an important one

sentences.english: his excessive drinking
sentences.chinese: 他的酗酒

sentences.english: $15 for two beers seems a little excessive.
sentences.chinese: 两杯啤酒要15美元，似乎有点过分。

detailed_translations.english: much more than is reasonable or necessary

name: exchange
trans: v. 交换，兑换；n. 交换，交流

sentences.english: We exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.english: It’s a place where people can chat and exchange ideas.
sentences.chinese: 在这个地方人们可以聊天和交流想法。

sentences.english: Four of my cassettes for your Madonna CD is a fair exchange.
sentences.chinese: 我用四盒磁带换你的麦当娜激光唱片很公平。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something and receive the same kind of thing from them at the same time
the act of giving someone something and receiving something else from them

name: executive
trans: adj. 执行的，管理的；n. 行政人员

sentences.english: a commission with executive powers
sentences.chinese: 有执行权的委员会

detailed_translations.english: relating to the job of managing a business or organization and making decisions
a group of people who are in charge of an organization and make the rules

sentences.english: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.english: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.chinese: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

detailed_translations.english: to be present in a place or situation

sentences.english: Scientists have many theories about how the universe first came into existence (= started to exist ).
sentences.chinese: 关于宇宙的起源，科学家有多种理论。

sentences.english: Pablo led a miserable existence when he first moved to San Juan.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗刚搬到圣胡安时，生活很悲惨。

detailed_translations.english: the state of existing

sentences.english: He will be hard to beat. I fully expect (= am completely sure about ) that and I’m ready.
sentences.chinese: 他很难击败。我确信这一点，不过我准备好了。

sentences.english: ‘Who are you?’ he murmured, only half expecting (= thinking it was possible, but not likely ) her to answer.
sentences.chinese: “你是谁？”他低声问道，预计她可能不会回答。

sentences.english: to expect a visit/call/letter from sb
sentences.chinese: 等待某人的来访 / 电话 / 来信

detailed_translations.english: to think that something will happen because it seems likely or has been planned

sentences.english: Having raised expectations (= made people more hopeful ), he went on to help only a few people.
sentences.chinese: 他唤起了大家的希望，但接着只是帮助了几个人。

sentences.english: The show exceeded all expectations (= was much better than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 这场演出比人们预期的要好得多。

sentences.english: The number of people who attended fell short of expectations (= was lower than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 出席的人数比预期的要少。

detailed_translations.english: what you think or hope will happen

sentences.english: The open cities will be testing grounds for our external policies.
sentences.chinese: 使开放城市成为对外政策的窗口。

sentences.english: The ear canal also named middle ear splays out at the external position.
sentences.chinese: 耳道亦称中耳，内小外大呈喇叭状。

sentences.english: Riddled with a thousand gaping wounds, this reactionary clique is now beset with difficulties and contradictions both in internal and external affairs.
sentences.chinese: 今天， 这个反动集团百孔千疮， 内外交困， 矛盾重重。

sentences.english: the fading evening light
sentences.chinese: 渐暗的暮色

sentences.english: a pair of faded jeans
sentences.chinese: 一条褪了色的牛仔裤

sentences.english: The sun had faded the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 太阳把窗帘晒得褪了色。

detailed_translations.english: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this

sentences.english: The house had a fairly large garden.
sentences.chinese: 那幢房子有个不小的花园。

sentences.english: She speaks English fairly well.
sentences.chinese: 她英语讲得还不错。

sentences.english: I felt I hadn’t been treated fairly.
sentences.chinese: 我感到自己没有受到公正对待。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little, but much less than very

name: feature
trans: n. 特征，特点；v. 以...为特色

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

name: finance
trans: n. 财政，金融；v. 提供资金

sentences.english: leasing and other forms of business finance
sentences.chinese: 租赁及其他商业金融形式

sentences.english: Russia’s finance minister
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯财政部长

sentences.english: the world of high finance
sentences.chinese: 高级金融界

detailed_translations.chinese: 财政，金融；财源，财务情况
detailed_translations.english: the management of money by governments, large organizations etc
to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something

sentences.english: Surveys conducted in other countries reported similar findings.
sentences.chinese: 在其他国家进行的调查也报告说有类似的结果。

detailed_translations.english: the information that someone has discovered as a result of their study, work etc

sentences.english: the former Soviet Union
sentences.chinese: 前苏联

sentences.english: Their farm has been reduced to half its former size.
sentences.chinese: 他们的农场已缩小到以前的一半。

sentences.english: Of the two possibilities, the former seems more likely.
sentences.chinese: 在这两种可能性中，前者似乎更有可能。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing before, but not now
the first of two people or things that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: The house was still burning, pouring forth thick black smoke.
sentences.chinese: 房子仍在燃烧，冒出浓浓的黑烟。

detailed_translations.english: going out from a place or point, and moving forwards or outwards

sentences.english: It took the builders three weeks to lay the foundations .
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人花了三星期的时间打地基。

sentences.english: The earthquake shook the foundations of the house.
sentences.chinese: 地震动摇了那幢房子的地基。

sentences.english: the British Heart Foundation
sentences.chinese: 英国心脏病基金会

detailed_translations.english: the solid layer of  cement  , bricks, stones etc that is put under a building to support it

sentences.english: There is little doubt that the scheme fulfils a need for our community.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，这计划会满足我们社区的需求。

sentences.english: Visiting Disneyland has fulfilled a boyhood dream.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼乐园之游使童年梦想成真。

detailed_translations.english: to do or provide what is necessary or needed

name: generous
trans: adj. 慷慨的，宽宏大量的

sentences.english: Dietler is generous with his time and money.
sentences.chinese: 迪特勒在他的时间和金钱方面慷慨大方。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is generous is willing to give money, spend time etc, in order to help people or give them pleasure

sentences.english: The film reveals Fellini’s genius.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片展现了费里尼的天赋。

sentences.english: a work of pure genius
sentences.chinese: 天才之作

detailed_translations.english: a very high level of intelligence, mental skill, or ability, which only a few people have

name: grant
trans: v. 授予，同意；n. 拨款，许可

sentences.english: Britain could grant Spain’s request .
sentences.chinese: 英国可能会同意西班牙的请求。

sentences.english: I would love to be able to grant her wish.
sentences.chinese: 我很希望能够满足她的愿望。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something or allow them to have something that they have asked for

name: grasp
trans: v. 抓住，理解；n. 抓住

sentences.english: I grasped his arm firmly and led him away.
sentences.chinese: 我紧紧抓住他的胳膊把他带走。

sentences.english: Alan grasped the handle and pulled it.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦抓住手柄一拉。

sentences.english: A short opening paragraph enables the reader to quickly grasp what the article is about.
sentences.chinese: 开篇的小段落使读者很快就能掌握文章的大意。

sentences.english: Luke took her arm in a firm grasp and led her through the gate.
sentences.chinese: 卢克紧紧抓着她的胳膊，领她进了门。

detailed_translations.english: to take and hold something firmly
the way you hold something or your ability to hold it

name: guarantee
trans: v. 保证，担保；n. 保证，担保

sentences.english: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.chinese: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.english: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

detailed_translations.english: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
a formal promise that something will be done

name: guard
trans: v. 保护，守卫；n. 警卫，守卫

sentences.english: The Sergeant told Swift to guard the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 中士叫斯威夫特守着入口。

sentences.english: a lioness guarding her cubs
sentences.chinese: 守护着幼狮的母狮

sentences.english: There were two security guards on duty outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼外面有两名保安在值勤。

detailed_translations.english: to protect a person, place, or object by staying near them and watching them
someone whose job is to protect a place or person

name: guide
trans: v. 引导，指导；n. 向导，指南

sentences.english: a tour guide
sentences.chinese: 导游

sentences.english: an experienced mountain guide
sentences.chinese: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.english: We were guided around the museums.
sentences.chinese: 我们在导游的带领下参观了博物馆。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to take tourists to a place and show them around
to show sb the way to a place, often by going with them

sentences.english: He used to buy them expensive presents, out of guilt.
sentences.chinese: 出于内疚，他以前总是给他们买昂贵的礼物。

sentences.english: He felt an enormous sense of guilt when he thought about how he’d treated her.
sentences.chinese: 他想到自己那样对待她，心里非常歉疚。

sentences.english: He did not deny his guilt.
sentences.chinese: 他没有否认自己有罪。

sentences.english: His guilt was proved beyond all doubt by the prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 他的罪行已被原告方证实确凿无疑。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of shame and sadness because you know that you have done something wrong

name: handle
trans: v. 处理，操控；n. 把手

sentences.english: I handled most of the paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 大部分文书工作是我做的。

sentences.english: The case is being handled by a top lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 此案正由一位顶尖律师负责处理。

sentences.english: The finance department handles all the accounts.
sentences.chinese: 财务部处理所有账目。

sentences.english: Computers can handle huge amounts of data.
sentences.chinese: 计算机能处理大量数据。

detailed_translations.english: to do the things that are necessary to complete a job

name: highlight
trans: v. 强调，突出；n. 最精彩的部分

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.english: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.chinese: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

sentences.english: In the distance, the dot of a boat appeared on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 远处小黑点般的一条小船出现在地平线上。

sentences.english: a course of study that will broaden your horizons
sentences.chinese: 一门能开阔眼界的课程

detailed_translations.english: the line far away where the land or sea seems to meet the sky

sentences.english: ...the male sex hormone testosterone.
sentences.chinese: …男性性激素睾酮。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance produced by your body that influences its growth, development, and condition

sentences.english: We want a clean healthy environment for all humanity .
sentences.chinese: 我们希望全人类拥有一个干净健康的生存环境。

sentences.english: crimes against humanity
sentences.chinese: 反人类罪

sentences.english: We must never forget our common humanity.
sentences.chinese: 我们永远不要忘记共同的人性。

detailed_translations.english: people in general

name: ideal
trans: adj. 理想的，完美的；n. 理想

sentences.english: advice on how to reach your ideal weight
sentences.chinese: 如何达到理想体重的建议

sentences.english: The scheme offers an ideal opportunity for youngsters to get training.
sentences.chinese: 该计划为年轻人提供了获得培训的极好机会。

sentences.english: With so much rain, conditions are far from ideal.
sentences.chinese: 雨水这么多，天气情况很不理想。

detailed_translations.english: the best or most suitable that something could possibly be
a principle about what is morally right or a perfect standard that you hope to achieve

sentences.english: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
sentences.chinese: 让我举个例子来说明这一点。

sentences.english: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

detailed_translations.english: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.english: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

sentences.english: His bad behaviour was just an isolated incident.
sentences.chinese: 他的不良行为只是个别事件。

sentences.english: Roads were sealed off because of a major incident.
sentences.chinese: 因为发生重大事故，道路被封锁了。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially sth unusual or unpleasant

name: increasing
trans: adj. 逐渐增加的，越来越多的

sentences.english: The blood tests prove that Vince is indeed the father.
sentences.chinese: 验血证明文斯确实是父亲。

sentences.english: ‘Would it help if you had an assistant?’ ‘It would indeed.’
sentences.chinese: “你要是有个助手，会有帮助吗？”“那是肯定的。

sentences.english: Most of the essays were very good indeed.
sentences.chinese: 这些文章大多数都非常好。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a statement or answer

sentences.english: By 1900, Britain was a mainly industrial society.
sentences.chinese: 到1900年英国已基本进入工业社会。

detailed_translations.english: relating to industry or the people working in it

sentences.english: An infant’s skin is very sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的皮肤非常敏感。

sentences.english: infant formula milk
sentences.chinese: 婴(幼)儿配方奶

detailed_translations.english: a baby or very young child
intended for babies or very young children

name: infrastructure
trans: n. 基础设施，基础结构

sentences.english: Some countries lack a suitable economic infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 一些国家缺乏适当的经济基础设施。

sentences.english: a $65 billion investment package in education, health care and infrastructure
sentences.chinese: 用于教育、医疗和基础设施的650亿美元一揽子投资计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 基础设施；公共建设；下部构造
detailed_translations.english: the basic systems and structures that a country or organization needs in order to work properly, for example roads, railways, banks etc

sentences.english: I wish my son would show more initiative.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我的儿子能表现得再主动一些。

sentences.english: Don’t keep asking me for advice. Use your initiative.
sentences.chinese: 别老是要我给你出主意，发挥一下你自己的决断能力吧。

sentences.english: Lt. Carlos was not obeying orders. He acted on his own initiative (= he was not told what to do ).
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯中尉没有服从命令，而是自作主张。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to make decisions and take action without waiting for someone to tell you what to do

sentences.english: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.english: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.english: He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
