sentences.english: scenes of abject poverty
sentences.chinese: 极度贫困的情景

sentences.english: the causes of urban poverty
sentences.chinese: 造成城市贫困的原因

detailed_translations.english: the situation or experience of being poor

name: premium
trans: n. 额外费用，保险费；adj. 优质的

sentences.english: premium ice cream
sentences.chinese: 优质冰激凌

sentences.english: the current consumer trend for premium products
sentences.chinese: 当前消费者喜欢购买优质产品的趋向

sentences.english: premium quality British potatoes
sentences.chinese: 优质英国马铃薯

detailed_translations.chinese: 高级的，优质的；售价高的
detailed_translations.english: of very high quality

detailed_translations.chinese: 保险金；额外费用，加付款；奖品，赠品；额外津贴
detailed_translations.english: the cost of insurance, especially the amount that you pay each year

sentences.english: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

detailed_translations.english: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about

name: pride
trans: n. 自豪，骄傲；v. 以...为豪

sentences.english: He wore his medals with pride.
sentences.chinese: 他自豪地戴着奖章。

sentences.english: The people have a sense of pride in their community.
sentences.chinese: 人们对自己的社区有一种自豪感。

sentences.english: His heart swelled with pride when his daughter came in.
sentences.chinese: 女儿进来时他的内心充满了自豪感。

sentences.english: She felt a glow of pride when her name was announced for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 宣布她获奖时她感到非常自豪。

sentences.english: Success in sport is a source of national pride .
sentences.chinese: 体育方面的成就可以激发民族自豪感。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that you are proud of something that you or someone connected with you has achieved
to be especially proud of something that you do well, or of a good quality that you have

name: print
trans: v. 打印，出版；n. 印刷品

sentences.english: Over five million copies of the paper are printed every day.
sentences.chinese: 这份报纸每日印量超过五百万。

sentences.english: When the book was first written no publisher would print it.
sentences.chinese: 这本书刚写成时没有出版商愿意出版。

sentences.english: There was no print at all on the backs of the tickets.
sentences.chinese: 门票背面没有印任何文字。

detailed_translations.english: to produce many printed copies of a book, newspaper etc
writing that has been printed, for example in books or newspapers

name: produce
trans: v. 生产，制造；n. 农产品

sentences.english: New drugs are producing remarkable results.
sentences.chinese: 新药正在产生显著的效果。

sentences.english: a rise in sea level produced by climatic change
sentences.chinese: 由气候变化引起的海平面升高

sentences.english: As a policy, it did not produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 作为一项政策，它并未产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: a factory that produces microchips
sentences.chinese: 微芯片制造厂

sentences.english: He produced a letter from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他从口袋里掏出一封信来。

detailed_translations.english: to cause a particular result or effect

sentences.english: That model won't go into production before late 2007.
sentences.chinese: 那种型号要到2007年底才会投入生产。

sentences.english: a drop in oil and gas production
sentences.chinese: 石油和天然气产量的下降

detailed_translations.english: the process of making or growing things to be sold, especially in large quantities

sentences.english: people who work in the professions
sentences.chinese: 从事专业性工作的人

sentences.english: nurses, social workers, and other people in the caring professions
sentences.chinese: 护士、社工和其他从事护理行业的人

detailed_translations.english: a job that needs a high level of education and training

sentences.english: a profound question
sentences.chinese: 深刻的问题

sentences.english: Jenner is a profound thinker.
sentences.chinese: 詹纳是个思想深刻的人。

detailed_translations.english: showing great knowledge and understanding

sentences.english: She paid for her purchases and left.
sentences.chinese: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.english: I enclose my receipt as proof of purchase .
sentences.chinese: 我附上小票作为购物凭证。

sentences.english: She made two purchases from my stall.
sentences.chinese: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在网上买保险。

detailed_translations.english: something you buy, or the act of buying it
to buy something

sentences.english: The government has decided to scrap quotas on car imports.
sentences.chinese: 政府决定取消汽车进口配额。

sentences.english: There are plans to introduce strict immigration quotas.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要推行严格的移民限额制度。

detailed_translations.english: an official limit on the number or amount of something that is allowed in a particular period

name: quote
trans: v. 引用，报价；n. 引文

sentences.english: He quoted a short passage from the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 他引用了《圣经》里的一小段。

sentences.english: A military spokesman was quoted as saying that the border area is now safe.
sentences.chinese: 报道引述军方一位发言人的话，说边境地区现在很安全。

sentences.english: They quoted a price of £15,000.
sentences.chinese: 他们报价1.5万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat exactly what someone else has said or written

sentences.english: The gang picked their victims at random.
sentences.chinese: 这帮犯罪分子随意选择对象下手。

sentences.english: The company has introduced random drug testing of its employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司已实行对雇员的随机毒品测试。

detailed_translations.english: without any definite plan, aim, or pattern
happening or chosen without any definite plan, aim, or pattern

sentences.english: This species of plant is becoming increasingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物越来越罕见。

sentences.english: I only saw Helen on the rare occasions when I went into her shop.
sentences.chinese: 我只有偶尔去海伦店里时才会见到她。

sentences.english: It is very rare for her to miss a day at school.
sentences.chinese: 她很少有哪一天不上学的。

detailed_translations.english: not seen or found very often, or not happening very often

sentences.english: You don’t happen to recall his name, do you?
sentences.chinese: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

sentences.english: As I recall, it was you who suggested this idea in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 我记得，是你首先提出这个想法的。

sentences.english: Cole was recalled to the squad to replace the injured Quinn.
sentences.chinese: 科尔被召回队里代替受伤的奎因。

sentences.english: The cars had to be recalled due to an engine fault.
sentences.chinese: 由于发动机缺陷，那些汽车必须召回。

detailed_translations.english: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

sentences.english: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition .
sentences.chinese: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

detailed_translations.english: the act of knowing someone or something because you have known or learned about them in the past

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

name: recruit
trans: v. 招募，招聘；n. 新兵

sentences.english: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.chinese: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

sentences.english: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.chinese: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

sentences.english: Drill sergeants have eight weeks to turn fresh recruits into soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 操练军士要在八个星期之内把新兵训练成真正的士兵。

detailed_translations.english: to find new people to work in a company, join an organization, do a job etc
someone who has just joined the army, navy, or  air force

sentences.english: In his speech, he referred to a recent trip to Canada.
sentences.chinese: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

detailed_translations.english: If you refer to a particular subject or person, you talk about them or mention them

sentences.english: The drop in consumer spending reflects concern about the economy.
sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

detailed_translations.english: if a person or a thing is reflected in a mirror, glass, or water, you can see an image of the person or thing on the surface of the mirror, glass, or water

name: reform
trans: v. 改革，改造；n. 改革

sentences.english: plans to radically reform the tax system
sentences.chinese: 彻底改革税收制度的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 改革， 改良， 改造； 改正， 改过自新
detailed_translations.english: to improve a system, law, organization etc by making a lot of changes to it, so that it operates in a fairer or more effective way

sentences.english: She asked him to leave, but he refused.
sentences.chinese: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

sentences.english: When he offered all that money, I could hardly refuse (= could not refuse ) , could I?
sentences.chinese: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

sentences.english: The town made a weekly collection of refuse.
sentences.chinese: 该镇每周收一次垃圾。

detailed_translations.english: to say firmly that you will not do something that someone has asked you to do
waste material that has been thrown away

name: regard
trans: v. 视为，尊敬；n. 关注

sentences.english: He was regarded as the most successful president of modern times.
sentences.chinese: 他被看成是近代最成功的总统。

detailed_translations.english: to think about someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.chinese: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

detailed_translations.english: without being affected or influenced by something

name: register
trans: v. 注册，登记；n. 登记簿

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

name: regret
trans: v. 后悔，遗憾；n. 遗憾

sentences.english: We regret any inconvenience caused to our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们对于给顾客造成的不便表示歉意。

sentences.english: It is with great regret that I must decline your offer.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我不得不谢绝你的好意。

detailed_translations.english: to feel sorry about sth you have done or about sth that you have not been able to do
sadness that you feel about something, especially because you wish it had not happened

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

sentences.english: The relative merits of both approaches have to be considered.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法的相对优点都得考虑在内。

sentences.english: her opponent’s relative lack of experience
sentences.chinese: 她的对手相对来说缺少经验

sentences.english: You may think you’re poor, but it’s all relative (= you are not poor compared to some people ) .
sentences.chinese: 你可能认为自己很穷，但一切都是相对的。

detailed_translations.english: having a particular quality when compared with something else
a member of your family

name: release
trans: v. 释放，发布；n. 释放，发布

sentences.english: Police arrested several men, who were later released.
sentences.chinese: 警察逮捕了几个人，后来都释放了。

sentences.english: The bears are eventually released into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 这些熊最后被放回野生环境中。

sentences.english: You need to release the tension in these shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你需要放松肩部肌肉。

sentences.english: The new trade figures have just been released.
sentences.chinese: 新的贸易数字刚刚公布。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

sentences.english: Relevant documents were presented in court.
sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.english: We received all the relevant information.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

detailed_translations.english: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered

sentences.english: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.chinese: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.english: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.chinese: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on

sentences.english: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.english: money raised for the relief effort
sentences.chinese: 为赈灾筹集的钱款

detailed_translations.english: when something reduces someone’s pain or unhappy feelings

sentences.english: Drugs helped to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 药物有助于舒缓疼痛。

sentences.english: A secretary was hired to relieve her of some of the administrative work.
sentences.chinese: 一个秘书被雇来为她减轻一些行政工作的负担。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce someone’s pain or unpleasant feelings

sentences.english: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion that people have about someone or something because of what has happened in the past

sentences.english: Canada’s vast mineral resources
sentences.chinese: 加拿大丰富的矿产资源

sentences.english: a country rich in natural resources
sentences.chinese: 自然资源丰富的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 资源； 财力； 应付办法， 谋略
detailed_translations.english: something such as useful land, or minerals such as oil or coal, that exists in a country and can be used to increase its wealth

sentences.english: They are likely to respond positively to the president's request for aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们有可能积极地回应该总统的援助请求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答， 答复； 作出反应， 响应
detailed_translations.english: to do something as a reaction to something that has been said or done

sentences.english: a retail price of £8.99
sentences.chinese: 8.99英镑的零售价

sentences.english: The retail value would be around $500.
sentences.chinese: 零售价在500美元左右。

sentences.english: Retail sales fell by 1.3% in January.
sentences.chinese: 1月份零售额下降了1.3%。

sentences.english: The wine retails at £6.95 a bottle.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒每瓶的零售价为6.95英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the sale of goods in shops to customers, for their own use and not for selling to anyone else
to be sold for a particular price in a shop

name: review
trans: v. 回顾，复习；n. 复习，评论

sentences.english: The government will review the situation later in the year.
sentences.chinese: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.english: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.english: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.english: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully examine or consider sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes
(North Amercian English) a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

name: reward
trans: n. 奖励，报酬；v. 奖励，酬谢

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.english: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

detailed_translations.english: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked fo

name: rival
trans: n. 竞争对手；v. 竞争

sentences.english: This gives the company a competitive advantage over its rivals.
sentences.chinese: 这使该公司与其对手相比具有一项竞争优势。

sentences.english: He finished 39 seconds ahead of his main rival .
sentences.chinese: 他比主要对手早39秒到达终点。

sentences.english: She was 2 minutes faster than her nearest rival .
sentences.chinese: 她比紧随其后的对手快两分钟。

sentences.english: a game against their old rivals , Manchester United
sentences.chinese: 和他们的老对手曼联队的比赛

sentences.english: They still remain bitter rivals (= hate each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们仍是死敌。

sentences.english: Their sales have now overtaken those of their arch-rival (= main or strongest rival ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的销售额现已超过了主要竞争对手。

detailed_translations.english: a person, group, or organization that you compete with in sport, business, a fight etc

name: routine
trans: n. 常规，惯例；adj. 常规的

sentences.english: John’s departure had upset their daily routine .
sentences.chinese: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.english: Try to get into a routine (= develop a fixed order of doing things ) .
sentences.chinese: 尽量养成一套习惯。

sentences.english: my daily exercise routine
sentences.chinese: 我每天的锻炼习惯

sentences.english: Dressing is a task which we do every day as a matter of routine (= done regularly and not unusual ) .
sentences.chinese: 穿衣打扮是我们每天必做的事情。

sentences.english: You mustn’t worry. These are just routine enquiries.
sentences.chinese: 你不必担心，这只是例行的询问。

detailed_translations.english: the usual order in which you do things, or the things you regularly do
happening as a normal part of a job or process

sentences.english: the royal palace
sentences.chinese: 王宫

sentences.english: the royal family
sentences.chinese: 王室

detailed_translations.english: relating to or belonging to a king or queen

sentences.english: a rural setting
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境

sentences.english: rural bus routes
sentences.chinese: 乡村公共汽车路线

detailed_translations.english: happening in or relating to the countryside, not the city

name: sample
trans: n. 样品，样本；v. 取样

sentences.english: They took a blood sample to test for hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 他们取了血样做肝炎化验。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that is examined in order to find out something about the whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…抽样； 品尝， 体验
detailed_translations.english: to taste food or drink in order to see what it is like

sentences.english: the launch of a communications and weather satellite
sentences.chinese: 气象通信卫星的发射

detailed_translations.english: a machine that has been sent into space and goes around the Earth, moon etc, used for radio, television, and other electronic communication

name: schedule
trans: n. 时间表，日程；v. 安排

sentences.english: How can he fit everything into his busy schedule ?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.english: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

detailed_translations.english: a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it

name: scheme
trans: n. 计划，方案；v. 策划

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

name: score
trans: n. 得分，分数；v. 得分

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

sentences.english: ...the nation's manufacturing sector.
sentences.chinese: …该国的制造部门。

detailed_translations.english: a part of an area of activity, especially of business, trade etc

name: secure
trans: adj. 安全的，稳固的；v. 确保，保护

sentences.english: There are no secure jobs these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

sentences.english: We want a secure future for our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望我们的孩子未来生活无虞。

sentences.english: United’s position at the top of the league seems relatively secure.
sentences.chinese: 联队在联赛中的头名位置似乎相对稳固。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that is secure is one that you can depend on because it is not likely to change
to make something safe from being attacked, harmed, or lost

sentences.english: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

detailed_translations.english: very rarely or almost never

name: sequence
trans: n. 顺序，序列；v. 排列顺序

sentences.english: Be careful to perform the actions in the correct sequence.
sentences.chinese: 注意要按正确的顺序来完成动作。

detailed_translations.english: the order that something happens or exists in, or the order it is supposed to happen or exist in

sentences.english: I’ve worked with children in various settings, mainly in secondary school.
sentences.chinese: 我在许多地方教过孩子，主要是在中学。

sentences.english: The heating system was already on its highest setting.
sentences.chinese: 取暖系统已经调到了最高挡。

detailed_translations.english: the place where something is or where something happens, and the general environment

sentences.english: When the children had settled, Miss Brown gave out the new reading books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们静下来后，布朗小姐给他们发新的故事书。

sentences.english: She breathed deeply to settle her nerves (= stop herself from feeling worried or frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 她深深地吸了口气平静自己的情绪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 安放； 调停； 支付， 核算； 安家； 飞落， 停留； 安定
detailed_translations.english: to become quiet and calm, or to make someone quiet and calm

sentences.english: Union leaders and company bosses will meet tomorrow in an attempt to reach a settlement .
sentences.chinese: 工会领导人和公司老板将于明天举行会议以期达成协议。

sentences.english: His lawyers are understood to be negotiating a settlement .
sentences.chinese: 据说他的律师正在商谈一个协议。

sentences.english: Hopes grew that a workable peace settlement might emerge.
sentences.chinese: 达成一项可行的和平协定的希望越来越大。

sentences.english: She got her home as part of the divorce settlement .
sentences.chinese: 根据离婚协议，她拿到了房子。

sentences.english: The company paid out over $10 million in an out-of-court settlement .
sentences.chinese: 这家公司花了1,000多万美元进行庭外和解。

detailed_translations.chinese: 解决； 协议； 居留地， 小社区
detailed_translations.english: an official agreement or decision that ends an argument, a court case, or a fight, or the action of making an agreement

sentences.english: Make sure you use a good sharp knife.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要用锋利的好刀。

sentences.english: Its teeth are razor sharp (= very sharp ) .
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿非常锋利。

sentences.english: Do not cross the bridge but turn sharp left to go down on to the towpath.
sentences.chinese: 不要过桥，而是向左急转下到纤道上去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的
detailed_translations.english: having a very thin edge or point that can cut things easily
Sharp is also an adverb

name: shelter
trans: n. 庇护，避难所；v. 保护，庇护

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.chinese: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
If a place or thing is sheltered by something, it is protected by that thing from wind and rain

sentences.english: There is no heating available due to fuel shortages.
sentences.chinese: 因为燃料短缺，所以没有供暖。

sentences.english: There is no shortage of funds.
sentences.chinese: 不缺资金。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is not enough of something that people need

name: sign
trans: n. 标志，迹象；v. 签署

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

name: signal
trans: n. 信号，标志；v. 发信号

sentences.english: He pressed the red alarm signal to see if it was on or off.
sentences.chinese: 他按了一下红色报警信号钮，检查一下它是开著的还是关著的。

detailed_translations.english: important
a sound or action that you make in order to give information to someone or tell them to do something
to make a sound or action in order to give information or tell someone to do something

sentences.english: Completing the race is not just a simple matter of physical fitness.
sentences.chinese: 跑完比赛不仅仅是纯粹的体力问题。

sentences.english: I’m afraid Luke’s a bit simple.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得卢克有点笨。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that only one thing is involved

sentences.english: The house is in a charming situation, on a wooded hillside.
sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

detailed_translations.english: the type of area where a building is situated - used especially by people who sell or advertise buildings

sentences.english: Skilled craftsmen, such as carpenters, are in great demand.
sentences.chinese: 对木工之类的熟练工匠需求量很大。

sentences.english: The company is fortunate to have such highly skilled workers.
sentences.chinese: 公司有这样一些技能熟练的工人真是幸运。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled has the training and experience that is needed to do something well

name: sort
trans: n. 种类，分类；v. 分类，整理

sentences.english: Most of the victims developed psychological problems of one sort or another (= of various different types ).
sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.english: They do burgers, pizzas, that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 他们供应汉堡包、比萨饼什么的。

sentences.english: The eggs are sorted according to size.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸡蛋是按大小分类的。

detailed_translations.english: a group or class of people, things etc that have similar qualities or features
to put things in a particular order or arrange them in groups according to size, type etc

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

sentences.english: His spirits were so low (= he was so sad ) that he refused to answer his phone.
sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people

name: spot
trans: n. 地点，斑点；v. 发现，认出

sentences.english: a nice quiet spot on the beach
sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.english: I chose a spot well away from the road.
sentences.chinese: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

detailed_translations.english: a particular place or area, especially a pleasant place where you spend time

detailed_translations.chinese: 认出， 发现； 玷污
detailed_translations.english: to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize

sentences.english: The staff were very good.
sentences.chinese: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.english: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
sentences.chinese: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全体职员，员工；工作人员；参谋
detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an organization

name: stage
trans: n. 阶段，舞台；v. 举办，组织

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

sentences.english: crime/unemployment, etc. statistics
sentences.chinese: 犯罪、失业等统计资料

sentences.english: According to official statistics the disease killed over 500 people.
sentences.chinese: 根据官方的统计数字，500多人死于这种疾病。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of information shown in numbers

name: stead
trans: n. 代替，接替；v. 对...有利

sentences.english: My grandmother and aunt will be there in my parents' stead.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖母和姑妈将代替我的父母出席。

sentences.english: These two games here will stand them in good stead for the future.
sentences.chinese: 这里的两场比赛对他们的将来很有用。

detailed_translations.english: If you do something in someone's stead, you replace them and do it instead of them.

name: stem
trans: v. 阻止，起源于；n. 茎，干

sentences.english: ‘Writ ’ is the stem of the forms ‘writes ’, ‘writing ’ and ‘written ’.
sentences.chinese: writ是writes、writing和written三个词的词干。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a word that stays the same when different endings are added to it, for example ‘driv-’ in ‘driving’

name: stick
trans: v. 粘住，固定住；n. 棍，棒

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of wood, plastic etc that you use for a particular purpose
if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

name: stock
trans: n. 股票，库存；v. 备有，储存

sentences.english: We stock a wide range of kitchen equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我们备有各种厨房用品。

detailed_translations.english: if a shop stocks a particular product, it keeps a supply of it to sell
something that is available in a shop and does not have to be ordered

detailed_translations.chinese: 原料，库存品；股本，公债；世系，血统；汤汁；家畜，牲畜
detailed_translations.english: a liquid made by boiling meat or bones and vegetables, which is used to make soups or to add  flavour  to other dishes

sentences.english: the government’s long-term economic strategy
sentences.chinese: 政府的长期经济策略

sentences.english: a company’s business strategy
sentences.chinese: 公司的经营策略

detailed_translations.english: a planned series of actions for achieving something

sentences.english: The police force is below strength at the moment (= there are fewer police than there should be ).
sentences.chinese: 目前警力不足。

sentences.english: the strength of a rope
sentences.chinese: 绳子的强度

detailed_translations.english: the number of people in a team, army etc

sentences.english: Our friendship has steadily strengthened over the years.
sentences.chinese: 我们的友谊逐年加深。

sentences.english: Steve’s opposition only strengthened her resolve to go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫的反对反而坚定了她继续下去的决心。

sentences.english: The company plans to strengthen its hand (= make itself more powerful ) in Europe by opening an office in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 该公司计划在西班牙设立办事处，以此增强在欧洲的实力。

detailed_translations.english: to become stronger or make something stronger

name: strike
trans: v. 罢工，打击；n. 罢工，打击

sentences.english: The government has promised that the army will be called in to help if there is a firemen’s strike.
sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when a group of workers deliberately stop working because of a disagreement about pay, working conditions etc

name: stuff
trans: n. 材料，东西；v. 塞满

sentences.english: I’ve got some sticky stuff on my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?
sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

sentences.english: We have the support of a substantial number of parents.
sentences.chinese: 我们有相当多家长的支持。

sentences.english: a substantial salary
sentences.chinese: 丰厚的薪水

sentences.english: a substantial breakfast
sentences.chinese: 丰盛的早餐

sentences.english: The document requires substantial changes.
sentences.chinese: 文件需要作大量修改。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可观的， 大量的； 物质的， 坚固的； 实质的， 真实的
detailed_translations.english: large in amount or number

sentences.english: The pictures are similar, but there are subtle differences between them.
sentences.chinese: 这些图片很相似，但它们之间有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The warning signs of the disease are so subtle that they are often ignored.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病的警示征兆不易察觉，因而往往被忽视。

sentences.english: a subtle form of racism
sentences.chinese: 隐性的种族歧视

sentences.english: The dish had a subtle hint of ginger.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜微微带点姜的味道。

detailed_translations.english: not easy to notice or understand unless you pay careful attention

name: suit
trans: v. 适合，符合；n. 套装，诉讼

sentences.english: Johnson has filed suit against her.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.english: a civil suit
sentences.chinese: 民事诉讼

sentences.english: There are countryside walks to suit everyone.
sentences.chinese: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or company brings to a court of law to be settled
to be acceptable, suitable, or  convenient  for a particular person or in a particular situation

name: sum
trans: n. 总数，金额；v. 总结，合计

sentences.english: He owes me a large sum of money .
sentences.chinese: 他欠我一大笔钱。

sentences.english: You will have to pay the sum of the two sets of costs.
sentences.chinese: 你得支付那两笔费用的总和。

sentences.english: I was good at sums at school.
sentences.chinese: 我上学时擅长算术。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money

name: supply
trans: v. 供应，提供；n. 供应，供给

sentences.english: The nation’s fuel supplies will not last forever.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.english: To protect the food supply , the government ordered the slaughter of affected cattle.
sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

name: supreme
trans: adj. 最高的，至高无上的

sentences.english: the Supreme Allied Commander in Europe
sentences.chinese: 欧洲盟军最高指挥官

sentences.english: a country where the car reigns supreme
sentences.chinese: 汽车占绝对优势地位的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高的；至高的；最重要的
detailed_translations.english: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence

name: surround
trans: v. 包围，围绕；n. 周围的环境

sentences.english: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

detailed_translations.english: to be all around someone or something on every side

sentences.english: Only 12 of the 140 passengers survived.
sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.english: She survived the attack.
sentences.chinese: 她在袭击中幸免于难。

sentences.english: people who survive cancer
sentences.chinese: 癌症幸存者

detailed_translations.chinese: 活下来，继续存在；幸免于
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

detailed_translations.chinese: 从中挺过来； 从…逃出； 比…活得长
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live normally in spite of many problems

name: switch
trans: n. 开关，转换；v. 切换，转换

sentences.english: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

detailed_translations.english: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another

sentences.english: a systematic approach to solving the problem
sentences.chinese: 系统解决问题的办法

detailed_translations.english: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way

name: thin
trans: adj. 薄的，瘦的；v. 变薄，变瘦

sentences.english: a thin gold chain
sentences.chinese: 一条细细的金链

sentences.english: She’s only wearing a thin summer jacket (= a jacket made of light material ) .
sentences.chinese: 她只穿了一件薄薄的夏装外套。

sentences.english: two thin slices of bread
sentences.chinese: 薄薄的两片面包

sentences.english: The road was covered with a thin layer of ice.
sentences.chinese: 路面上覆盖着一层薄薄的冰。

sentences.english: The skin on the eyelids is the thinnest on the body.
sentences.chinese: 眼睑上的皮肤是人体最薄的皮肤。

sentences.english: NATO will continue to thin out its forces.
sentences.chinese: 北约将继续裁军。

sentences.english: NATO will continue to thin out its forces.
sentences.chinese: 北约将继续裁军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄的；瘦的；稀薄的；微弱的
detailed_translations.english: if something is thin, there is only a small distance between its two opposite sides or surfaces
Thin out means the same as
Thin out means the same as

sentences.english: Your threats don’t scare me.
sentences.chinese: 你的那些威胁吓不倒我。

sentences.english: threats made against his wife and children
sentences.chinese: 对他妻儿的威胁

sentences.english: Nichols never carried out his threat to resign.
sentences.chinese: 尼科尔斯威胁过要辞职，但从未付诸行动。

sentences.english: The government will not give in to terrorist threats .
sentences.chinese: 政府不会屈服于恐怖分子的威胁。

sentences.english: She dismissed the statement as an empty threat .
sentences.chinese: 她无视这项声明，认为是个空口威胁。

sentences.english: They warned him with veiled threats not to mention anything he had witnessed.
sentences.chinese: 他们话中有话地威胁他不要提及他所目睹的事。

sentences.english: The police are investigating death threats made against the two men.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在调查针对这两名男子的死亡恐吓。

sentences.english: Officials at the school say they received a bomb threat at approximately 11:30 a.m. today.
sentences.chinese: 学校的官员说他们在今天上午11点半左右收到过炸弹恐吓。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which you tell someone that you will cause them harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

sentences.english: Postal workers are threatening a strike if they don’t receive a pay increase.
sentences.chinese: 邮政工人威胁如果不加薪，他们就要罢工。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you will cause someone harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

sentences.english: Most of the evidence was destroyed in the fire. Thus it would be almost impossible to prove him guilty.
sentences.chinese: 大多数证据已在大火中烧毁，因而要证明他有罪几乎是不可能的。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: ...Cuba's tobacco crop.
sentences.chinese: …古巴的烟草作物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 烟草，烟叶；烟草制品；抽烟
detailed_translations.english: the dried brown leaves that are smoked in cigarettes, pipes etc

sentences.english: It was a tough race.
sentences.chinese: 比赛打得很艰难。

sentences.english: She’s had a tough life.
sentences.chinese: 她的生活十分艰辛。

sentences.english: The company admitted that it had been a tough year.
sentences.chinese: 公司承认那是艰难的一年。

sentences.english: Tough decisions will have to be made.
sentences.chinese: 必须作出艰难的决定。

sentences.english: The reporters were asking a lot of tough questions .
sentences.chinese: 记者们问了很多难以回答的问题。

sentences.english: (= a difficult decision ) , but we had to cancel the game because of the weather.
sentences.chinese: 尽管是一个艰难的决定，但由于天气不好我们只得取消比赛。

sentences.english: I find his books pretty tough going (= difficult to read ) .
sentences.chinese: 我发现他的书很难读。

sentences.english: Gage predicted the president’s proposal would be a tough sell (= something that is difficult to persuade someone about ) before Congress.
sentences.chinese: 盖奇预言总统的提议在国会很难通过。

detailed_translations.english: difficult to do or deal with

sentences.english: Poetry doesn’t usually translate well.
sentences.chinese: 诗歌通常都译不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 翻译；转化；解释；转变为；调动
detailed_translations.english: to change written or spoken words into another language

sentences.english: She read the letter and gave us a rough translation (= she did not translate everything exactly ) .
sentences.chinese: 她看了信，给我们大概翻译了一下。

sentences.english: I’ve only read ‘Madame Bovary’ in translation (= not in its original language ) .
sentences.chinese: 我只读过《包法利夫人》的翻译本。

sentences.english: Much of the book’s humour has been lost in translation (= is no longer effective when translated ) .
sentences.chinese: 本书的许多幽默元素已在翻译过程中丢失。

detailed_translations.english: when you translate something, or something that has been translated

name: trend
trans: n. 趋势，倾向；v. 倾向，趋势

sentences.english: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.english: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.chinese: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.english: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.chinese: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.english: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.english: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.english: national and international economic trends
sentences.chinese: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.english: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.chinese: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.english: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.chinese: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

detailed_translations.english: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

name: trial
trans: n. 试验，审判；v. 测试

sentences.english: The trial is due to start next week.
sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a legal process in which a judge and often a  jury  in a court of law examine information to decide whether someone is guilty of a crime

sentences.english: a railway tunnel
sentences.chinese: 铁路隧道

sentences.english: the Channel Tunnel (= between England and France )
sentences.chinese: 〔英吉利〕海峡隧道

detailed_translations.english: a passage that has been dug under the ground for cars, trains etc to go through

detailed_translations.chinese: 挖；在…打开通道；在…挖掘隧道
detailed_translations.english: to dig a long passage under the ground

name: understanding
trans: n. 理解，谅解；adj. 善解人意的

sentences.english: Luckily, I have a very under­standing boss.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，我有一个非常通情达理的上司。

detailed_translations.chinese: 体谅的， 宽容的， 通情达理的
detailed_translations.english: sympathetic and kind about other people’s problems

detailed_translations.chinese: 理解，理解力；谅解；协议；相互理解，融洽
detailed_translations.english: an unofficial or informal agreement

sentences.english: Closure of the plant means 80 workers are facing unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂的关闭意味着 80 个工人面临失业。

sentences.english: a town where there is high unemployment
sentences.chinese: 高失业率城镇

detailed_translations.english: when someone does not have a job

name: unexpected
trans: adj. 意外的，突如其来的

sentences.english: The experiment produced some unexpected results.
sentences.chinese: 这次试验产生了一些意想不到的结果。

sentences.english: Her death was totally unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 她的死完全出人意料。

sentences.english: Hague’s announcement was not entirely unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 黑格的声明并非完全出乎意料。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe something that is surprising because you were not expecting it

name: unlike
trans: adj. 不同的；prep. 不像，与...不同

sentences.english: They are both teachers. Otherwise they are quite unlike.
sentences.chinese: 他们两位都是教师；除此之外他们迥然不同。

sentences.english: Music is quite unlike any other art form.
sentences.chinese: 音乐与其他艺术形式迥然不同。

detailed_translations.english: not alike
completely different from a particular person or thing

sentences.english: Donna might be able to come tomorrow, but it’s very unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 唐娜明天也许能来，不过这可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: not likely to happen

sentences.english: Test scores vary from school to school.
sentences.chinese: 测验成绩各校不同。

sentences.english: The heights of the plants vary from 8 cm to 20 cm.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.english: Medical treatment varies greatly from state to state.
sentences.chinese: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.english: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.english: Charges vary according to size.
sentences.chinese: 费用因大小而异。

sentences.english: She has tried different diets with varying degrees of success.
sentences.chinese: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.english: tests of varying levels of difficulty
sentences.chinese: 难易程度不一的测验

sentences.english: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.chinese: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

detailed_translations.english: if several things of the same type vary, they are all different from each other

sentences.english: The refugees come across the border in vast numbers.
sentences.chinese: 大量难民涌过边境。

sentences.english: In the past five years, there has been a vast improvement in graduation rates.
sentences.chinese: 过去的五年内，毕业率大幅度提高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨大的， 大量的； 浩瀚的
detailed_translations.english: extremely large

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

sentences.english: The website allows you to take a virtual tour of the art gallery.
sentences.chinese: 这个网站可让你对美术馆作一番虚拟参观。

sentences.english: constructing virtual worlds
sentences.chinese: 构筑虚拟世界

detailed_translations.english: made, done, seen etc on the Internet or on a computer, rather than in the real world

sentences.english: She suffered temporary loss of vision after being struck on the head.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受撞击以后出现暂时性失明。

sentences.english: Tears blurred her vision (= made it difficult for her to see ).
sentences.chinese: 泪水模糊了她的视线。

sentences.english: The idea came to her in a vision.
sentences.chinese: 她在神示中想到了这个主意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to see

sentences.english: Try to eat foods that are rich in vitamins and minerals.
sentences.chinese: 尽量吃富含维生素和矿物质的食物。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance in food that is necessary for good health

sentences.english: The young birds weigh only a few grams.
sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.english: Do you know how much it weighs?
sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

sentences.english: I'll just wipe the table.
sentences.chinese: 我只擦擦桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to remove liquid, dirt, or marks by wiping
a wiping movement with a cloth

sentences.english: a man of great wisdom
sentences.chinese: 一个有大智慧的男人

sentences.english: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫总能冒出几句至理名言。

detailed_translations.english: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life

name: witness
trans: n. 证人，目击者；v. 目击，见证

sentences.english: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.chinese: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.english: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
sentences.chinese: 抢劫案的一名目击者

detailed_translations.english: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
detailed_translations.english: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned

name: wonder
trans: v. 想知道，惊讶；n. 奇迹，惊叹

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

sentences.english: A couple of other books are worthy of mention.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些其他的书值得一提

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

name: yield
trans: v. 生产，屈服；n. 产量，收益

sentences.english: Our research has only recently begun to yield important results.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近我们的研究才开始取得重要成果。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a result, answer, or piece of information

sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the US in the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 美国于19世纪废除了奴隶制。

detailed_translations.english: to officially end a law, system etc, especially one that has existed for a long time

sentences.english: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
sentences.chinese: 共和党人坚持自己的保守议题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 议程；日常工作事项；日程表
detailed_translations.english: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with

name: exact
trans: adj. 精确的，确切的；v. 要求

sentences.english: Police are still investigating the exact cause of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 警方还在调查这起事故的确切原因。

sentences.english: What were his exact words?
sentences.chinese: 他的原话是什么？

sentences.english: The timing had to be exact.
sentences.chinese: 对时机的把握必须精确。

sentences.english: Some concepts in Chinese medicine have no exact equivalent in Western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中医的一些概念在西医中没有完全一样的对应观念。

detailed_translations.english: completely correct in every detail
to demand and get something from someone by using threats, force etc

sentences.english: Cooking fumes may activate the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 烹调时的油烟可能会触发警报器。

sentences.english: The yeast’s growth is activated by sugar and warmth.
sentences.chinese: 糖分和温暖的环境会激发酵母菌的生长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性
detailed_translations.english: to make an electrical system or chemical process start working

sentences.english: I don’t drink alcohol anymore.
sentences.chinese: 我不再喝酒了。

sentences.english: alcohol abuse
sentences.chinese: 酗酒

sentences.english: people with alcohol problems
sentences.chinese: 有酗酒问题的人

detailed_translations.english: drinks such as beer or wine that contain a substance which can make you drunk

name: alien
trans: adj. 外国的，外星的；n. 外星人，外国人

sentences.english: alien cultures
sentences.chinese: 异域文化

sentences.english: an alien multiracial society
sentences.chinese: 一个多种族的异国社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 外国的；相异的，性质不同的；不相容的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to another country or race
someone who is not a legal citizen of the country they are living or working in

name: ambitious
trans: adj. 有雄心的，野心勃勃的

sentences.english: Alfred was intensely ambitious, obsessed with the idea of becoming rich.
sentences.chinese: 艾尔弗雷德雄心勃勃，一心想着发财。

detailed_translations.english: determined to be successful, rich, powerful etc

sentences.english: Britain's head of state is a constitutional monarch.
sentences.chinese: 英国的国家元首是君主立宪的国王或女王。

detailed_translations.english: a king or queen

name: alarm
trans: n. 警报，惊慌；v. 使惊慌

sentences.english: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.english: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.english: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

sentences.english: We could not see what had alarmed him.
sentences.chinese: 我们不明白是什么吓着他了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise to warn you of danger
If something alarms you, it makes you afraid or anxious that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen

sentences.english: The book treats of astronomy.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是讲天文学的。

sentences.english: This was the birth of astronomy.
sentences.chinese: 这就是天文学的起源。

sentences.english: You could study astronomy , or space engineering , and be good at it.
sentences.chinese: 你可以学习天文学，或是空间工程学，可以学的很棒。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the stars and  planet s

sentences.english: One hundred and twenty people died in China’s worst air disaster .
sentences.chinese: 有120人在中国这起最惨烈的空难事故中丧生。

sentences.english: the economic consequences of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster
sentences.chinese: 切尔诺贝利核灾难给经济带来的后果

sentences.english: The 1987 hurricane was the worst natural disaster to hit England for decades.
sentences.chinese: 1987年的飓风是英格兰数十年来遭遇的最为严重的自然灾害。

sentences.english: Their expedition nearly ended in disaster , when one of the climbers slid off the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 一名登山者从山上滑落，他们的探险活动险些以灾难告终。

sentences.english: The drought could spell disaster for wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 干旱可能会对野生生物造成灾难。

sentences.english: Disaster struckwhen two men were killed during their parachute jumps.
sentences.chinese: 灾难突然降临，两名男子在跳伞过程中丧生。

sentences.english: The peace process was on the brink of disaster .
sentences.chinese: 和平进程到了灾难的边缘。

sentences.english: Luckily the pilot saw the other plane just in time, and a disaster was narrowly averted .
sentences.chinese: 幸好驾驶员及时看到了另一架飞机，侥幸避免了一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden event such as a flood, storm, or accident which causes great damage or suffering

sentences.english: Eight drawings by French artist Jean Cocteau will be auctioned next week.
sentences.chinese: 法国艺术家让·科克托的8幅画作将在下周拍卖。

detailed_translations.english: to sell something at an auction
a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them

name: combat
trans: n. 战斗，斗争；v. 与...战斗

sentences.english: In the case of this battle, the combat did only last a singleday.
sentences.chinese: 在译成战役的情况下，这场战斗仅仅持续了短短的一天。

sentences.english: We will remove our combat brigades from Iraq by the end of next summer, and all of our troops by the end of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在明年夏末从伊拉克撤回我们的战斗旅，在2011年末，我们所有军队都将从伊拉克撤出。

sentences.english: These people would then be given training in vigilance and combat not just to defend themselves but also the borders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人会被提供警戒和战斗训练，不仅是为了保护自己，而且要保护边界安全。

detailed_translations.english: fighting, especially during a war

sentences.english: a combination nightclub and café
sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

sentences.english: She embodies everything I admire in a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 她具备了我所钦佩的教师该具备的一切素质。

detailed_translations.chinese: 体现，使具体化；具体表达
detailed_translations.english: to be a very good example of an idea or quality

sentences.english: The symbol on the packet is a guarantee that the food has been produced organically.
sentences.chinese: 包装盒上的这个标识保证这种食物是有机生产的。

sentences.english: Fe is the chemical symbol for iron.
sentences.chinese: Fe是铁的化学符号。

detailed_translations.english: a picture or shape that has a particular meaning or represents a particular organization or idea

sentences.english: Long-term savers qualify for a cash bonus.
sentences.chinese: 长期储户可获现金红利。

sentences.english: Further additions to your pay may take the form of bonus payments.
sentences.chinese: 工资以外的钱可能以奖金的形式发放。

sentences.english: a Christmas bonus
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节奖金

sentences.english: Each worker receives an annual bonus.
sentences.chinese: 每个员工都可获得一笔年度奖金。

sentences.english: a £20,000 bonus
sentences.chinese: 一笔2万英镑的奖金

detailed_translations.english: money added to someone’s wages, especially as a reward for good work

sentences.english: Iterates may be categorized into stable and unstable sets depending on whether a neighborhood under iteration converges or diverges. Some move toward stability, others away.
sentences.chinese: 根据一个受迭代影响的社区是聚合还是发散，迭代可以被归类到稳定和不稳定集。有些转向稳定，有些转离。

name: border
trans: n. 边界，边境；v. 接壤

sentences.english: countries that border the Mediterranean
sentences.chinese: 地中海沿岸的国家

sentences.english: ...the European and Arab countries bordering the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: …地中海沿岸的欧洲国家和阿拉伯国家。

detailed_translations.english: if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it
a band along or around the edge of something such as a picture or piece of material
A country that borders another country, a sea, or a river is next to it

sentences.english: These instruments calculate distances precisely.
sentences.chinese: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算， 推算； 计划， 打算
detailed_translations.english: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers

sentences.english: We walked along by the side of the canal.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着运河边往前走。

sentences.english: the Panama Canal
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马运河

detailed_translations.chinese: 运河；[地理] 水道；[建] 管道；灌溉水渠
detailed_translations.english: a long passage dug into the ground and filled with water, either for boats to travel along, or to take water to a place

sentences.english: captive soldiers
sentences.chinese: 被俘的士兵

sentences.english: captive animals
sentences.chinese: 被关住的动物

sentences.english: His son had been taken captive (= became a prisoner ) during the raid.
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子在这次突袭中被劫持了。

sentences.english: a pilot who was held captive (= kept as a prisoner ) for six years
sentences.chinese: 一名被囚六年的飞行员

detailed_translations.chinese: 被俘虏的， 被监禁的
detailed_translations.english: kept in prison or in a place that you are not allowed to leave
someone who is kept as a prisoner, especially in a war

sentences.english: the conception of parliamentary democracy
sentences.chinese: 议会民主的概念

sentences.english: changing conceptions of the world
sentences.chinese: 这个世界不断变化的观念

detailed_translations.english: an idea about what something is like, or a general understanding of something

sentences.english: He conceived the idea of transforming the old power station into an arts centre.
sentences.chinese: 他想出了一个把旧发电站改造为艺术中心的主意。

sentences.english: God is often conceived of as male.
sentences.chinese: 上帝常常被想象为男性。

sentences.english: She is unable to conceive.
sentences.chinese: 她不能怀孕。

sentences.english: Their first child was conceived on their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 他们的第一个小孩是在新婚之夜怀上的。

detailed_translations.english: to form an idea, a plan, etc. in your mind; to imagine sth

sentences.english: ...the largest recipient of U.S. foreign aid.

sentences.chinese: 有益于免疫系统的一种药物

sentences.english: an arrangement that is mutually beneficial

detailed_translations.english: having a good effect

sentences.chinese: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.chinese: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧。

trans: n. 牺牲，献祭；v. 牺牲

sentences.english: The minister stressed the need for economic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 部长强调了在经济上作出牺牲的必要性。

sentences.english: His progress this term has been satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 他这学期的进步令人满意。

detailed_translations.english: good enough for a particular purpose

trans: n. 人工制品，手工艺品

sentences.chinese: 古埃及手工艺品

detailed_translations.chinese: 人工制品， 手工艺品
detailed_translations.english: an object such as a tool, weapon etc that was made in the past and is historically important

trans: v. 击败，战胜；n. 失败

sentences.chinese: 他们希望在海上击败敌人。

sentences.english: She was a woman who hated to admit defeat.
sentences.chinese: 她是个不愿认输的女人。

detailed_translations.english: to win a victory over someone in a war, competition, game etc

sentences.english: Structured teaching facilitates learning.

detailed_translations.english: to make an action or a process possible or easier

sentences.chinese: 〔英国及英联邦国家〕妇女协会全国联合会

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府
detailed_translations.english: a group of organizations, clubs, or people that have joined together to form a single group

sentences.chinese: 她在女儿面前总是为丈夫辩解。

sentences.english: Students should be ready to explain and defend their views.

a list of passengers or goods carried on a ship, plane, or train
plain and easy to see

sentences.chinese: 我的儿媳说我多管闲事，但我只是想帮忙。

sentences.chinese: 劳资关系应不受政府干预。

sentences.chinese: 这两个历史时期的差别在哪里？

detailed_translations.english: to recognize or express the difference between things or people

sentences.chinese: 什么都比家里的紧张气氛好。

sentences.chinese: 天气暖和的时候，穿天然织物的衣服要舒适得多。

detailed_translations.english: better or more suitable

sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜的纤维素含量很高。

sentences.chinese: 尼龙是一种人造纤维。

sentences.chinese: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

sentences.chinese: 城里的激烈战斗

name: file
trans: n. 文件，档案；v. 归档

sentences.chinese: 我们将把你的详细资料存档。

sentences.chinese: 我不可能给你明确的答复。

sentences.chinese: 他明显表现出安于这种状况的样子。

sentences.chinese: 他挥手从腋下取出帽子，拉低帽檐盖住眼睛。

sentences.chinese: 他还不能吃固体食物，只能进流食。

trans: v. 规划，构想，系统地阐述

sentences.chinese: 我以原价的一个零头买到了这双鞋子。

sentences.chinese: 难以形容的混乱场面

sentences.chinese: 污染物渗进了土壤。

sentences.chinese: 她穿上衣服并拉好拉链。

sentences.chinese: 他曾是佐治亚大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.chinese: 我三天没睡觉了——一点不夸张。

sentences.chinese: 摩天大楼

sentences.chinese: 不学无术的人

sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

sentences.chinese: 我们衷心感谢所有参与者。

sentences.chinese: 她感激地看了我一眼。

sentences.chinese: 由于利率上调，他们的财务问题更加严重。

sentences.chinese: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.chinese: 进步的政府

sentences.chinese: 有前瞻性的进步政策

sentences.chinese: 共和党进步派和保守派之间分歧很大。

detailed_translations.english: supporting new or modern ideas and methods, especially in politics and education

sentences.chinese: 他用最粗俗的字眼辱骂那位海军上将。

sentences.chinese: 很多野生动物栖居在这片森林里。

sentences.chinese: 有人居住的岛屿

sentences.chinese: 有600万居民的城市

trans: v. 耗尽，排气；n. 排气管，废气

sentences.chinese: 讲一整天课令我精疲力竭。

sentences.chinese: 我们面临世界石油储备耗尽的危险。

sentences.chinese: 这三年的课程是作为连贯的整体来安排的。

sentences.chinese: 对该事件条理分明的陈述

sentences.chinese: 他如此镇定地回答了访谈中的问题。我希望我也能那样有条不紊。

sentences.chinese: 我犹豫。

sentences.chinese: 南安普敦队的球迷对球队的前任教练很不友善。

sentences.chinese: 卡尔不愿意面对冯公然敌视的目光。

sentences.english: his hostile attitude
sentences.chinese: 他敌对的态度

detailed_translations.english: angry and deliberately unfriendly towards someone, and ready to argue with them

sentences.english: Thanks for your hospitality over the past few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你几周来的热情款待。

sentences.english: a modest and humble man
sentences.chinese: 一个谦卑的男人

sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代，本田作为一家小型汽车公司因一举击垮行业巨头而声名鹊起。

detailed_translations.english: If you humble someone who is more important or powerful than you, you defeat them easily

sentences.chinese: 个人卫生的重要性

sentences.english: a food hygiene training course
sentences.chinese: 食品卫生培训课程

detailed_translations.english: the practice of keeping yourself and the things around you clean in order to prevent diseases

name: ideology
trans: n. 意识形态，思想体系

sentences.english: the ideologies of fascism and terrorism
sentences.chinese: 法西斯主义和恐怖主义的意识形态

sentences.english: a new ideology based on individualism
sentences.chinese: 基于个人主义的新思想体系

detailed_translations.english: a set of beliefs on which a political or economic system is based, or which strongly influence the way people behave

sentences.english: an imaginative use of computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的妙用

sentences.english: children’s imaginative play
sentences.chinese: 儿童富有想象力的游戏

sentences.english: an imaginative solution to the litter problem
sentences.chinese: 解决乱扔垃圾的问题的有创意的方法

detailed_translations.english: containing new and interesting ideas

name: inferior
trans: adj. 劣等的，次要的；n. 下属

sentences.english: I felt very inferior among all those academics.
sentences.chinese: 与那些大学教师在一起，我自惭形秽。

sentences.english: wine of inferior quality
sentences.chinese: 劣质葡萄酒

sentences.english: inferior goods
sentences.chinese: 质量低劣的商品

detailed_translations.english: not good, or not as good as someone or something else
someone who has a lower position or rank than you in an organization

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

sentences.english: These programs can be integrated with your existing software.
sentences.chinese: 这些程序能和你的已有的软件整合成一体。

detailed_translations.english: to combine two or more things so that they work together; to combine with sth else in this way

sentences.english: I have always regarded him as a man of integrity.
sentences.chinese: 我一直把他当作一个正直诚实的人。

name: jet
trans: n. 喷气式飞机，喷射；v. 喷出

sentences.chinese: 他拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.chinese: 他的儿子被注射了强效的药。

detailed_translations.english: to put liquid, especially a drug, into someone’s body by using a special needle

sentences.chinese: 两位部长发布了一项联合声明。

sentences.chinese: 这顿饭是大家一起做的。

trans: adj. 青少年的；n. 青少年

A juvenile is a child or young person who is not yet old enough to be regarded as an adult

name: elaborate
trans: adj. 精心制作的，复杂的；v. 详细阐述

sentences.chinese: 已经有了扩大娱乐场地的计划。

sentences.chinese: 为了确认窃贼的身份，警方会将这些照片放大。

detailed_translations.english: to make sth bigger; to become bigger

sentences.english: She received a small legacy from her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她从姨妈那里继承了一小笔遗产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产，遗赠；先人(或过去)留下的东西
detailed_translations.english: money or property that you receive from someone after they die

sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车跑长途容易过热。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is dependent on someone or something else

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which two or more countries, groups etc agree to work together to try to change or achieve something

sentences.english: A few days later, our armies liberated the city.
sentences.chinese: 几天以后，我军解放了这座城市。

detailed_translations.english: to free prisoners, a city, a country etc from someone’s control

detailed_translations.english: small and having a beautiful shape or appearance

sentences.chinese: 奥克利先生一直乐于提供信息帮助记者们。

sentences.chinese: 我们致电3位经济学家咨询消除赤字的方法，他们满足了我们的要求，给出了非常直接的答复。

sentences.chinese: 核限制条约

sentences.english: The name of the cheese is Dolcelatte, literally meaning ‘sweet milk’.
sentences.chinese: 这种奶酪名叫Dolcelatte，字面意思是 “甜牛奶” 。

sentences.chinese: 新一轮成人识字[扫盲]运动

detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to read and write

sentences.chinese: 非常对不起，我真心道歉。

sentences.chinese: 我在想方设法拖长这次谈话。

sentences.chinese: 她不再幻想他爱她了。

sentences.chinese: 采用双倍行距和宽阔的页边空白，以便留出地方写评注。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled at repairing motor vehicles and machinery

trans: adj. 最小的，最低限度的；n. 最小值

sentences.chinese: 美国公开赛将通过卫星现场直播。

sentences.english: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

sentences.chinese: 这些反馈意见将用于修改明年的课程。

sentences.chinese: 这次暴力事件显然是由政治动机引发的。

sentences.chinese: 一个偏远的边境小镇

sentences.chinese: 偏远山区的火灾

sentences.chinese: 他登上楼梯，慢慢环顾四周。

sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰

used as part of the name of a mountain

sentences.english: I had never seen such a multitude of stars before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从未见过这么多的星星。

sentences.chinese: 种种可能的解释

detailed_translations.english: a very large number of people or things

sentences.english: Baldry’s 20-year prison sentence was commuted to three years.
sentences.chinese: 鲍德里二十年的刑期被减至三年。

减； 折合， 折偿； 上下班交通
detailed_translations.english: to regularly travel a long distance to get to work

sentences.english: I didn’t like Dev, and the feeling seemed to be mutual.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢德夫，他好像也不喜欢我。

sentences.chinese: 两个男人互相吹捧，盛赞对方让自己受益匪浅。

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

sentences.english: the British Navy
sentences.chinese: 英国海军

sentences.english: He joined the navy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战争期间参加了海军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military forces that fights at sea

sentences.english: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.english: She had always regarded Greg as a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime

sentences.english: a numerical code
sentences.chinese: 数字密码

sentences.english: The home team tried to utilize their numerical advantage (= the fact that they had more players than the other team ).
sentences.chinese: 主队试图利用他们在人数上的优势。

sentences.chinese: 务必把这些档案按数字顺序排列。

detailed_translations.english: expressed or considered in numbers

sentences.chinese: 在温室里培育的植物

sentences.english: Nutrition and exercise are essential to fitness and health.
sentences.chinese: 营养和运动是保持健康所必不可少的。

sentences.english: a nutrition expert
sentences.chinese: 营养专家

detailed_translations.english: the process of giving or getting the right type of food for good health and growth

sentences.english: unleaded petrol
sentences.chinese: 无铅汽油

sentences.english: petrol prices
sentences.chinese: 汽油价格

sentences.english: The petrol tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 油箱漏了。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid obtained from  petroleum that is used to supply power to the engine of cars and other vehicles

name: adolescent
trans: adj. 青少年的；n. 青少年

sentences.english: It is important that an adolescent boy should have an adult in whom he can confide.
sentences.chinese: 一个青春期男孩应该有一个他能倾吐心声的成年人，这是很重要的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 青春期的； 青少年的
detailed_translations.english: Adolescent is used to describe young people who are no longer children but who have not yet become adults. It also refers to their behaviour.

sentences.chinese: 他们同意和巴西合作进行一个保护热带雨林的项目。

sentences.chinese: 我建议我的当事人要全力与警方配合。

the form of an adjective or adverb that shows an increase in size, degree etc when something is considered in relation to something else. For example, ‘bigger’ is the comparative of ‘big’, and ‘more slowly’ is the comparative of ‘slowly’

sentences.chinese: 这么快就想升职根本不现实。
